title: Creating the HeartMath Connection
body:
Howard Martin, from Heartmath, answers viewer questions on reducing stress and the science of creating a deep connection between the heart and brain, in this episode which was originally broadcast live. We explore the very fabric of consciousness, how it is changing and the emotional reactions to our perceptions of stress. All of this is reflected in an electromagnetic field, that surrounds the body, which can be detected and measured. 

Howard also played a key role in launching the Global Coherence Initiative (GCI), a science-based, co-creative project to unite people in heart-focused care and intention, and thereby to facilitate the shift in global consciousness from instability and discord to balance, cooperation and enduring peace. Join him to discover a powerful source of intelligence that can relieve stress and lift you into a new state of awareness, success and fulfillment.
teaser: Howard Martin, from Heartmath, answers viewer questions on reducing stress and the science of creating a deep connection between the heart and brain, in this episode which was originally broadcast live. We

title: Howard Martin on the HeartMath Solution for Stress
body:
Lisa Garr talks with Howard Martin, executive vice president of HeartMath, a program he helped Doc Childre found in 1991. HeartMath is a powerful research-based technique that helps establish heart-based living by inspiring people to connect with the intelligence and guidance of their own hearts.  Where stress creates chaos and disharmony in the body, the HeartMath technique is a way to manage stress, leading to a harmonious state called coherence, which, as Howard demonstrates, can be both measured and monitored.

Howard is also on the steering committee of the Global Coherence Initiative, a bold project to unite people in heart-focused care and intention, and thereby to facilitate the shift in global consciousness from instability and discord to balance, cooperation and enduring peace. Can it work?  Could, say, 350,000 people, heart-focused together at one time in a coherent state, have an impact on mankind? Join Lisa Garr and Howard Martin in this potentially life-changing conversation and learn about this remarkable experiment where we all may find role in the salvation of our world.
teaser: In an in-depth, wide-ranging interview, Lisa Garr talks with Howard Martin about stress and how to reduce it by understanding the scientific connection between heart and brain, and also why creating global coherence is so important at this time in history.

title: Gregg Braden on the Crises of Our Times
body:
Gregg Braden is a New York Times best-selling author whose pioneering work bridges science and spirituality. His newest book Deep Truth reveals startling new facts that will challenge your beliefs. The world is at a crossroads. We are facing the greatest number and the greatest magnitude of crises ever to face a single generation. Can we choose our future? Can we even plan it? 

Even as new discoveries come to light that should change our thinking, our institutions are clinging to the old stories, keeping vital knowledge from us. The way we have lived is changing, and to address the crises that are being created we’ve got to think differently than we have ever thought of ourselves before – and we’ve got to change this thinking very quickly. Gregg Braden and Lisa Garr discussed these discoveries and how we can apply this knowledge to our lives for the salvation of our world.
teaser: We are facing the greatest number and the greatest magnitude of crises ever to face a single generation. Can we choose our future? Can we even plan it?

title: Gregg Braden on Deep Truths Revealed
body:
For three decades, Gregg Braden has been searching high mountain villages, remote monasteries, distant archeological digs and forgotten texts in search of mankind’s timeless secrets. He asks, “How can we make the greatest choices for our survival until we know the deepest truths of our existence?” He wrote his latest book, Deep Truth, because these are critical times; never has a generation been faced with so many crises all within the same window in time. 

Gregg finds that society is stuck in outmoded ways of thinking because our media and educational institutions are failing to include the latest scientific discoveries in what they disseminate. He tackles our outdated myths head-on, including that nature is based on survival of the strongest or that war and competition are hard-wired into mankind. Cooperation, he insists, is a higher survival principle. And he points to excavations of civilizations twice as ancient as the ones we imagine to be the oldest, with elaborate cities that lack all evidence of war – no walls, no weapons, no mass graves. Looking at these ancient civilizations can reveal alternative approaches. In particular, he propose a heart-based solution that can unite and benefit all humankind.
teaser: In this in-depth and important conversation, Lisa Garr talks with Gregg Braden about the crises facing humankind today, the outmoded thinking that is preventing us from dealing with these crises, and the heart-based solutions that can show us the way forward.

title: David Wolfe on Energy, Health and Longevity
body:
Nutrition and natural health expert David Wolfe spoke with Lisa Garr about the tremendous healing potential of superfoods, such as goji berries, hempseed, cacao beans (raw chocolate), maca, spirulina, bee products and a host of others. Together they demonstrated how to make his secret Energy Elixir, a super-smoothie that rejuvenates and energizes the body and mind. David lives a remarkably busy life, but hasn’t gotten sick in 15 years! Tune in as he shares his secrets.

David Wolfe has been an advocate of raw food, superfoods and natural health for 22 years. A bestselling author, he coaches Hollywood celebrities and business people on nutrition and wellness. He is considered by his peers as one of the leading authorities in nutrition. 

The Energy Elixir Smoothie Recipe can be found at https://www.gaia.com/files/DavidWolfe_EnergyElixer_1.pdf
teaser: Lisa Garr interviews David Wolfe, one of the top experts on natural health, nutrition, herbalism, organic superfoods, raw foods and chocolate. Discover a whole new way to maximize your energy, health and longevity.

title: David Wolfe on Superfood Secrets to Optimal Health
body:
Lisa Garr hosts David Wolfe, one of the world’s top authorities on natural health, beauty nutrition, herbalism, chocolate and organic superfoods, for in-depth conversation and demonstrations of the most cutting-edge ways to achieve peak-performance health and optimal energy. As powerful sources of clean protein, vitamins, minerals, enzymes, antioxidants, good fats and oils, essential fatty and amino acids, and other nutrients, superfoods represent a uniquely promising piece of the nutritional puzzle. Lisa and David discuss the greatest health challenges we face today (low energy), and a host of related topics. (Do you know what telomeres are?  David thinks they can be a key to doubling our life expectancy!)

In the second part of the program, David blends up two of his special super drinks – one to balance blood sugar and one to boost brain power – while offering detailed information about all of the special ingredients, what they are and what they do. (For example, here’s a delicious tip everyone can love: cacao – the basic ingredient in chocolate – decreases your chance of a heart attack by as much as 50 percent!) Tune in to discover whole new ways to maximize your energy, health and longevity.

The Brain Booster and Blood Drink Smoothie Recipes can be found at https://www.gaia.com/files/DavidWolfe_BrainBooster_and_BloodDrink.pdf
teaser: With a life-long passion for inspiring people to “Have the Best Day Ever,” David Wolfe has touched the hearts and minds of hundreds of thousands of people across the world.  David joins Lisa Garr for in-depth discussions and demonstrations of the superfoods that will put you on the road to higher and higher levels of natural beauty, vibrant health, and peak performance.

title: Norm Shealy on Pain Management
body: Here’s your chance to discover natural ways to relieve pain — even elevate your mood — with neurosurgeon Dr. Norm Shealy, who has been developing safe, effective pain management techniques since the 1960s. In a fascinating conversation, Lisa Garr and Dr. Shealy discuss his pioneering work in holistic health, pain management and the emerging field of energy medicine. Dr. Shealy explains his “Five Rings” approach to health, and shows us how to use tapping, an acupressure technique to reduce pain and boost feel-good neurochemicals. The founding president of Holos University Graduate Seminary, Dr. Shealy holds 14 patents in the field of energy medicine, and has published 28 books and more than 300 articles. His most recent book is Energy Medicine, the Future of Health.
teaser: Lisa Garr interviews neurosurgeon Dr. Norm Shealy, a holistic health pioneer who has been an internationally recognized innovator in pain management for more than 40 years.

title: Norm Shealy on Freedom from Chronic Pain
body:
For more than 40 years, Dr. Norm Shealy has been developing safe and effective methods for pain management, such as his widely-used TENS unit (transcutaneous electrical nerve stimulation) and his system of the body’s Five Rings, a collection of energy circuits in the body based on the meridians in acupuncture.  

In this mind-opening conversation with Lisa Garr, Dr. Shealy explains and demonstrates how he uses tapping, an acupressure technique to stimulate the points along these rings, and he also demonstrates how he uses guided imagery (also known as visualization) to help create a healthy sense of inner balance, calm and well-being.
teaser: In this in-depth and remarkable conversation, Lisa Garr talks with neurosurgeon and holistic health pioneer Dr. Norm Shealy about his innovative work in holistic health, pain management and the emerging field of energy medicine.

title: Lynne Twist on Your Role in a Sustainable Future
body:
How would you live differently if you knew the choices you made in the next four years would determine the quality of life on this planet for the next 1,000 years? Lynne Twist – a global activist, consultant and award-winning author – spoke with Lisa Garr.

As co-founder of The Pachamama Alliance, Lynne works with indigenous people of the Amazon to educate and inspire individuals everywhere to bring forth a thriving, just and sustainable world. She is also the founder and president of the Soul of Money Institute, whose mission is to educate, inspire and empower people and organizations to align their financial resources with what they value most. 

Tune in to this remarkable conversation about practical ways that you, one person, can make a difference, as you awaken to your role in creating a sustainable future.

To learn more about Lynne Twist and the Pachamama Alliance, watch Awakening the Dreamer
teaser: Lisa Garr interviews Lynne Twist, a global activist, consultant and award-winning author who has dedicated her life to global initiatives that create a sustainable future for all. Discover your unique role in helping the world overcome hunger, poverty and environmental degradation.

title: Lynne Twist and the Soul of Activism
body:
Lynne Twist is the living embodiment of the committed life. The co-founder of the Hunger Project, the Soul of Money Institute, the Pachamama Alliance and, most recently, the 4 Years Go project, she works tirelessly to build a world that is environmentally sustainable, spiritually fulfilling and socially just.

In a highly candid and deeply inspiring conversation with Lisa Garr, Lynne spoke of her work and activism around the globe, the mentors who inspired her (including such remarkable icons as Buckminster Fuller and Mother Teresa), and the astonishing resilience of the people she’s partnered with, from shamans in the Amazon rainforest to mothers in Ethiopia who lost their children to famine.

Lynne speaks about the 2012 prophecies from the Mayans (and many others), and the need to wake up from our self-destructive materialistic trance and connect to a committed and compassionate life. Every one of us can make a difference; every one can contribute to a sustainable world. Tune in to this remarkable dialogue to discover the many ways to find your role in this awakening.
teaser: Lynne Twist is the living embodiment of the committed life. The co-founder of the Hunger Project, the Soul of Money Institute, the Pachamama Alliance and, most recently, the 4 Years Go project, she works tirelessly to build a world that is environmentally sustainable, spiritually fulfilling and socially just.

title: Dr Joe Dispenza on the Power of Changing Your Thinking
body:
Changing ingrained habits is hard. Or is it? Neuroscientist, chiropractor and author Dr Joe Dispenza empowers people to change from the inside out. On the publication date of his new book, Breaking the Habit of Being Yourself: How to Lose Your Mind and Create a New One, Lisa Garr interviewed Dr Dispenza.

Featured in the award-winning film What the Bleep Do We Know!?, Dr Dispenza combines the fields of quantum physics, neuroscience, brain chemistry, biology and genetics to teach you how to rewire your brain for health and happiness.

“Only when you are able to break the habit of being yourself can a new self emerge,” says Dr Dispenza.

Author of Evolve Your Brain: The Science of Changing Your Mind, Dr Dispenza has lectured in more than 24 different countries, on six continents, educating people about the functions of the human brain. He has taught thousands how to reprogram their thinking through scientifically proven neurophysiological principles.
teaser: Neuroscientist, chiropractor and author Dr Joe Dispenza uses a dynamic combination of science and practical techniques to teach you how to think differently – creating a healthier, happier you.

title: Dr Joe Dispenza on Breaking the Habit of Being Yourself
body:
When you try to change an old habit, do you wonder why it’s so difficult to change? Do you want to learn how to be more positive or resilient, but don’t know how?  In this eye-opening and potentially life-changing interview with Lisa Garr, Dr Joe Dispenza, a neuroscientist, chiropractor and author, explains how our habits are wired into our brains and what we can do about them.

He notes, “Nerve cells that fire together, wire together.”  There is something of a feedback loop at work:  As you repeat your activities, the brain’s pathways stay wired to repeat that activity, and so it becomes even more difficult to change. Repetition reinforces brain behavior, and by, say, age 35, our identity becomes a set of memorized behaviors. 

Change is possible, but it takes some effort and stepping out of our comfort zone. But every time you have a new thought or new activity, the neurons create new pathways (and there is dramatic video showing this happening). Dr. Dispenza explains the steps you can take to change your life, how it works and why it can be beneficial beyond your ability to imagine. Don’t miss this astonishing conversation.
teaser: In this eye-opening and potentially life-changing interview, Dr Joe Dispenza, a neuroscientist, chiropractor and author, explains to Lisa Garr how our habits are wired into our brains and what we can do to change them.

title: Raymond Moody on Near-Death Stories of Hope and Healing
body:
As the world’s leading expert in the field of near-death experience (he coined the phrase), Dr. Moody has spent a lifetime exploring this subject. Lisa Garr and Dr. Moody discussed his new memoir, Paranormal: My Life in Pursuit of the Afterlife, and shared extraordinary stories of hope and healing.

Dr. Moody is the bestselling author of 13 books including Life After Life, which has sold more than 13 million copies worldwide, as well as numerous articles in academic and professional literature. Dr. Moody continues to capture enormous public interest and generate controversy with his groundbreaking work on the near-death experience and what happens when we die.
teaser: Is there life after death? Yes, says Raymond Moody, M.D., psychiatrist and world-renowned researcher whose seminal work, Life After Life, completely changed the way we view death and dying.

title: Raymond Moody in Pursuit of the Afterlife
body:
Dr. Raymond Moody is the world’s leading expert in the field of near-death experience (a phrase he himself coined more than 30 years ago).  His book, Life After Life, is the seminal work in its field and has sold more than 13 million copies since its publication in 1976.  He sat down with Lisa Garr for a wide-ranging and eye-opening conversation about his years of research, the conclusions he has reached and his hopes for much greater understanding in the future.

Together, they discussed the commonality of the reports of near-death experience – a buzzing sound, separation from the body, a tunnel, apparitions of deceased loved ones, light, a review of one’s life, and, most important, an overwhelming sense of love and acceptance.  Dr. Moody revealed how his studies of Ancient Greece ignited his interest in the afterlife, and he describes how his research helped him locate the site of the Greek Oracle of the Dead and an understanding of its secrets.

“Love is the most important thing.”  That is the conclusion Dr. Raymond Moody has reached from listening to more than a thousand accounts of near-death experiences.  Many survivors said they came to understand the hurt they had caused when they had behaved in a mean-spirited or cruel way. Many also explained that they had experienced a sense of love that was beyond anything they had experienced before,and that it was total and all-accepting.  And they overwhelmingly remarked that the experience had taught them to be kinder and more loving. 

Don’t miss this fascinating interview, in which the possibilities of the afterlife offer great wisdom for how we might best conduct ourselves in this life.
teaser: Dr. Raymond Moody, psychiatrist, researcher and bestselling author, has interviewed more than a thousand survivors of near-death experiences. Watch this fascinating conversation between Dr. Moody and Lisa Garr to find out why, as a result of all of his research, Dr. Moody says, “Love is the most important thing.”

title: Larry Dossey on Using Premonitions for Health
body:
Have you ever thought of an old friend only to have her call you moments later? Or just know something would happen before it did?

Dr. Larry Dossey, author of The Power of Premonitions: How Knowing the Future Can Shape our Lives, explains how to tap into your premonitions for better health. Dr. Dossey and Lisa Garr discussed the science behind premonitions and revealed five ways to cultivate your intuition.

Dr. Dossey is responsible for changing the way the medical profession and the world look at prayer in medicine. His groundbreaking book Healing Words: the Power of Prayer and the Practice of Medicine is used by 80 medical schools.
teaser: Discover 5 ways to use premonitions for lasting health.

title: Larry Dossey on the Healing Power of Prayer
body:
Dr. Larry Dossey has done as much as anyone to establish the connection between science and spirituality. His pioneering book Healing Words, published more than 20 years ago, is now used as a textbook in more than 80 medical schools.  But acceptance wasn’t so widespread at first. In this wide-ranging and revealing conversation, Dr. Dossey and Lisa Garr discuss the past, present and future of healing and medicine.

Dr. Dossey describes his own skepticism in his early doctoring days, even resisting a case he observed of a man with terminal lung cancer who not only survived but was also restored to complete health when the only therapy the patient received was prayer. But when early studies produced data showing a positive impact for prayer on healing, Dr. Dossey realized he was not properly serving his patients if he ignored any effective treatment. The more deeply he looked into this power of prayer, the more he came to recognize its significance. Today, he remains one of the leading experts in this field, and he shares with us his belief that your healing intentions and prayers can and do make a difference – not only for you, but for the health of others as well.
teaser: Do you think the power of prayer has an effect on healing? Tune in to this interview Dr. Larry Dossey, whose pioneering work in this field changed the face of medicine.

title: Fred Alan Wolf on Space and Time in a Holographic Universe
body:
Physicist Fred Alan Wolf takes us on a fascinating journey from fundamental concepts of physics to the furthest limits of science and imagination.

Popularly known as Dr. Quantum, Fred Alan Wolf joined Lisa Garr for this conversation about space and time and what it means to live in a holographic universe. Exploring from the deep perspective of quantum physics, he described how we can take charge of our lives at the quantum level.

Dr. Fred Alan Wolf, Ph.D., is a physicist, writer and lecturer who earned his doctorate in theoretical physics at UCLA in 1963. He was featured in the groundbreaking films the Secret and What the Bleep Do We Know?   He has written 11 popular books on physics, including Taking the Quantum Leap, which earned the National Book Award for Science in 1982. Dr. Wolf has appeared on numerous radio and television programs, including The Discovery Channel's The Know Zone.
teaser: Physicist Fred Alan Wolf – aka Dr. Quantum – takes us on a fascinating journey from fundamental concepts of physics to the furthest limits of science and imagination.

title: Fred Alan Wolf on Time Travel
body:
Physicist Fred Alan Wolf, popularly known as Dr. Quantum, takes us on a deep and remarkable dive to the quantum level, where we are seriously challenged to rethink our notions of mind, time, space and matter. Are the past, present and future all mixed together?  What is the significance of light in our perception of reality?  How is it that the observer affects the observed? 

Dr. Quantum is nothing if not lively.  He blends his explanation of the “bubbles of possibility” with references to the Marx Brothers, the ancient Taoist philosopher Chuang Tzu, Star Trek, and his interpretation of the moment in Genesis when God says, “Let there be light.”

Hang in there with Dr. Quantum and Lisa Garr for this amazing conversation about some very complex issues.  Reconciling quantum theory with our perceptions of reality is sure to challenge our understanding of the world, and we can only be the better for it.
teaser: Is everything an illusion? Are the future, past and present all mixed together? Buckle up for a remarkable roller coaster ride into the realities of the tiniest subatomic realms – and what it all means for you.

title: Foster & Kimberly Gamble on the Making of Thrive
body:
Foster and Kimberly Gamble are the husband-and-wife team that created the provocative and ground-breaking documentary, Thrive: What on Earth Will it Take? As a young boy, Foster Gamble had an inquisitive personality that led him to envision a world scenario of a universal energy source. A direct descendant of the late James Gamble, a co-founder of Procter & Gamble, Foster is a lifelong seeker in the pursuit of knowledge. Not content with the current structure of power in the world and the massive global suffering, Foster Gamble set to make a documentary that unveiled the true reality of our existence in the 21st century.

Kimberly Carter Gamble is the co-founder and advisor for Clear Compass Media, producer, director and co-writer of Thrive. Kimberly brings a wealth of personal and professional experience to Clear Compass Media, and creating the movie Thrive called upon it all: as a former journalist, including for Newsweek International; a producer of large projects and events; as a lifelong activist for social justice; and as a mother and stepmother to nine children. 

Together, the Gambles joined Lisa Garr for a fascinating conversation about the making of the documentary, their hopes for the film, and the reactions they’ve encountered thus far. Watch the full-length film Thrive: What on Earth Will it Take?
teaser: Foster and Kimberly Gamble are the husband-and-wife team that created the provocative and ground-breaking documentary THRIVE. Join them for a lively conversation with Lisa Garr about the making of the film and the responses they’ve encountered.

title: Foster & Kimberly Gamble on THRIVE: The Movie, The Movement
body:
Foster and Kimberly Gamble are the husband-and-wife team that created the provocative and ground-breaking documentary, Thrive: What on Earth Will it Take? As a young boy, Foster Gamble had an inquisitive personality that led him to envision a world scenario of a universal energy source. A direct descendant of the late James Gamble, a co-founder of Procter & Gamble, Foster is a lifelong seeker in the pursuit of knowledge. Not content with the current structure of power in the world and the massive global suffering, Foster Gamble set out to make a documentary that unveiled the true reality of our existence in the 21st century.
Kimberly Carter Gamble is the co-founder and advisor for Clear Compass Media as well as the, producer, director and co-writer of Thrive. Kimberly brings a wealth of personal and professional experience to Clear Compass Media, and creating the Thrive movie called upon it all: as a former journalist, including for Newsweek International; a producer of large projects and events; as a lifelong activist for social justice; and as a mother and stepmother to nine children.
Together, the filmmakers joined Lisa Garr for a fascinating conversation about the making of the documentary, their hopes for the film, and the reactions they’ve encountered thus far. From activism to free energy to advancements in healthcare, their film calls for a new paradigm shift of wellness for all. Keep an open mind and watchW the new age film Thrive: What on Earth Will it Take?

It took the Gambles eight years to make THRIVE, a wide-ranging, eye-opening, provocative and controversial documentary that identifies the forces that a few very wealthy families have arrayed to establish and maintain their control over the world’s banks, governments, and all of us. They have dedicated themselves to alerting humanity to the influence of these forces, as well as putting forward solutions to free ourselves. Watching this interview will surely provide much to think about.

Watch the full-length film Thrive: What on Earth Will it Take?.
teaser: Foster and Kimberly Gamble, co-creators of THRIVE, discuss the personal journeys that led them to make the film and their hopes for its impact.  Their far-ranging, eye-opening and provocative documentary is causing quite a stir on the internet.

title: Riane Eisler on Creating a Caring Economics
body:
Riane Eisler is a social scientist, evolutionary theorist and cultural historian best known for her bestseller The Chalice and The Blade: Our History, Our Future, now in 25 foreign editions. She has been a leader in the movements for peace, environmental sustainability, economic equity and human rights — pioneering the extension of human rights protection to women’s rights and children’s rights. 

Hailed by Archbishop Desmond Tutu as “a template for the better world we have been so urgently seeking,” Riane’s newest book, The Real Wealth of Nations: Creating a Caring Economics, proposes a new approach to economics that gives visibility and value to the most essential human work: the work of caring for people and for our natural environment. She is also the author of Tomorrow’s Children: A Blueprint for Partnership Education in the 21st Century.

Riane and Lisa Garr enjoyed a wide-ranging conversation about Riane’s theories of partnership, gender, education, caring economics, and much more.
teaser: Riane Eisler is a social scientist, evolutionary theorist and cultural historian best known for her bestseller The Chalice and The Blade: Our History, Our Future, now in 25 foreign editions. She has been a leader in the movements for peace, environmental sustainability, economic equity and human rights — pioneering the extension of human rights protection to women’s rights and children’s rights.

title: Riane Eisler on the Power of Partnership
body:
Riane Eisler was a little girl in Austria at the time of the Nazi’s rise to power, which led her, early on, to wonder how it was that while we have such a capacity for empathy, caring and loving each other, how is it that we can behave with such cruelty. As she studied human history, she found that existing schemes of analysis – east vs. west, socialism vs. capitalism – did not provide a satisfactory explanation. She developed her own model of societies based on domination (of which the Nazis were an extreme example) or partnership, and she published her theory in The Chalice and the Blade, now a classic translated into 25 languages. 

Tune in to the remarkable conversation between Lisa Garr and Riane Eisler as they explore the wide range of social ramifications of Riane’s wisdom – from education, gender and even sex to economics and the media. Here is a new model for understanding human behavior, and a blueprint for a better society. Don’t miss the chance to meet this remarkable woman.
teaser: Riane Eisler – futurist, activist, cultural historian and evolutionary theorist – has long been a pioneer in the study of complex systems. Her ground-breaking theory of cultural traditions based on partnership or domination offers us a new and valuable way to understand human activity.

title: Victoria Boutenko on the Healing Power of Green Foods
body:
Discover the healing power of whole foods with raw foods chef Victoria Boutenko, as she shares some of her favorite recipes, including a beginner-friendly green smoothie, a cold-busting juice blend and more. Victoria Boutenko is the award-winning author of Green for Life, Raw Family: A True Story of Awakening, 12 Steps to Raw Foods, Green Smoothie Revolution and Raw Family Signature Dishes. A raw gourmet chef, teacher, inventor, researcher and artist, she teaches classes on healthy living all over the world. As a result of her teachings, millions of people are drinking green smoothies and eating raw food.

Victoria joined Lisa Garr in the studio for a conversation about the nutritional significance of her green food diet and a lively demonstration of her easy-but-delicious smoothie recipes.

Bonus Content: Oregano Tummy Soother Soup Recipe and Spinach Cold Buster Recipe.
teaser: Discover the healing power of whole foods with raw foods chef Victoria Boutenko, as she shares some of her favorite recipes, including a beginner-friendly green smoothie, a cold-busting juice blend and more.

title: Victoria Boutenko on the Green Smoothie Revolution
body:
When Victoria Boutenko moved her family from the Soviet Union to the United States, she was leaving a land of shortages for a land of plenty, and she just assumed that the wealthiest nation in the world would have the healthiest food.  She soon discovered otherwise as, after a year or two of eating a typical American diet of processed foods, the health of everyone in her family began to deteriorate dramatically.  She knew she had to make a change, and after much research and a chance encounter, she decided to embrace a raw-food diet – much to the dismay, originally, of her family members.

Improvement was felt literally overnight – after just one day of raw foods, everyone noticed how much better and more energetic they felt already. They became known as the Raw Family, and proselytized for their healthy new diet with books and videos.  In time, however, they decided to take their nutrition regimen a step further, and embrace a “green food” diet, combining leafy green vegetables with fruits for optimum health.

Join Victoria Boutenko as she talks with Lisa Garr about the nutritional research behind a green food diet and then demonstrates three easy and delicious smoothies – her Green Smoothie for Beginners, Coconut Green Eggnog, and a Rainbow Smoothie. 



Bonus Content:Coconut Green Eggnog Smoothie Recipe and Green Rainbow Smoothie Recipe.
teaser: Victoria Boutenko reveals the health secrets of her fabulous green smoothies, and she demonstrates her easy methods and shares her delicious recipes.

title: Jean Houston on Living with Passion and Purpose
body:
It’s estimated that nearly 40 percent of Americans are currently searching for their purpose in life and unsatisfied in their career choice. Regardless of age or education, many find themselves stuck in jobs or situations that leave them feeling uninspired, unmotivated or empty. The good news is that it’s never too late to really live a life overflowing with passion and purpose.

Jean Houston, Ph.D., is a philosopher, social activist, author of more than 26 books on human potential, and consultant to individuals, businesses and leaders around the world. She is one of the most respected teachers in human development and shared tools to help you step outside of the daily grind, so you can stop living solely to survive, but thrive with peace, passion and purpose.

In a remarkable, heart-opening conversation with Lisa Garr, Jean Houston, who combines research in human capacities with a rare perspective of myth, history, individual potential, spirituality and social transformation, shared her inspirational insights into the creativity and vision required for a revolutionary Renaissance of the human spirit.
teaser: It’s estimated that nearly 40 percent of Americans are currently searching for their purpose in life and unsatisfied in their career choice. The good news is that it’s never too late to really live a life overflowing with passion and purpose.

title: Jean Houston on Opening to Limitless Possibilities
body:
Jean Houston – whose résumé includes author, philosopher, story teller, social activist, actor, and so much more – is a pioneer in the human potential movement. In a lively and far-ranging conversation, she shows us that the “possible human” is the being that is inside of us, far greater than what we can see or imagine.

Jean shares the stories from her remarkable life, speaking of some the brilliant and influential thinkers she has known – such as Pierre Teilhard de Chardin and Margaret Mead – and describes the powerful influence they had on her, setting her on a path of exploration.

She discusses her belief that we are living in a critical era that may set mankind’s path for a long time to come. She talks about “Jump Time,” which she describes as a time of punctuated equilibrium. She notes that the evolutionary process seems to contain long periods of seemingly little activity with sudden jumps. Right now, she believes, we’re seeing an acceleration of time and history. For example, one of the important positive changes she describes is the steady rise in women’s status.

And Jean shows us some remarkable exercises that can help us reach our full potential. In one case, she helps Lisa deepen a connection to her goals with the help of her five senses. In another case, Jean shows us how we can use a great story (in this instance, The Wizard of Oz) to help us change our own story, by connecting with the mythic and universal themes.
teaser: Jean Houston – whose résumé includes author, philosopher, story teller, social activist, actor, and so much more – is a pioneer in the human potential movement. In a lively and far-ranging conversation, she shows us that the “possible human” is the being that is inside of us, far greater than what we can see or imagine.

title: Doreen Virtue on Clairvoyance and Hidden Worlds
body:
Doreen Virtue is a lifelong clairvoyant who works with the angelic, elemental, and ascended-master realms in her writings and workshops. She joined Lisa Garr for a fascinating conversation about these often-hidden worlds, and how we can incorporate this knowledge into our own lives.

Doreen Virtue is the author of more than 20 books including her newest release, Mary, Queen of Angels and the best-selling Healing with the Angels and Messages from Your Angels books/angel cards. She holds B.A., M.A., and Ph.D. degrees in counseling psychology.
teaser: Doreen Virtue is a lifelong clairvoyant who works with the angelic, elemental, and ascended-master realms in her writings and workshops. Join her for a fascinating conversation about a world that is often poorly understood.

title: Doreen Virtue on Connecting with Angels
body:
Ever since she was a child, Doreen Virtue recognized that she could see things that no one else saw. She was clairvoyant, and she saw angels and she saw dead people. Uncomfortable at first with being so different from everyone else, today Doreen willingly helps people connect with their guides and guardian angels.

Tune into this remarkable interview to hear Doreen discuss how she is in contact with angels, and how everyone has a guardian angel who we can call on for help any time. She explains who the archangels are and the roles they play, and she describes the ways in which angels communicate with people.

Doreen also talks about her research into the energy frequencies in different words and expressions, and especially the higher energy that comes from positive words. And she also previews her series of Angel Cards, designed along the principles of Tarot cards, but stressing a positive understanding of the stories they tell.
teaser: Explore the subject of guides and guardian angels with Doreen Virtue, a lifelong clairvoyant who works with the angelic realm and is one of the foremost authorities in this area.

title: Bruce H. Lipton on Using Thoughts to Control Genes
body:
Bruce H. Lipton, Ph.D., cell biologist and lecturer, is an internationally recognized leader in the “new” biology. His pioneering research on cloned stem cells presaged the revolutionary field of epigenetics, the new science of how environment and perception control genes. 

Did you know that your thoughts control your genes? This could be one of the biggest breakthroughs in science today, learning to turn on and off genetic markers with the power of your thoughts and perceptions.  Bruce explored this subject and more in this mind-opening conversation. 

Bruce H. Lipton served on the faculty of the University of Wisconsin’s School of Medicine and later performed groundbreaking research at Stanford University’s School of Medicine. He is the bestselling author of The Biology of Belief and the more recent Spontaneous Evolution, co-authored with Steve Bhaerman. In 2009, Bruce received the prestigious 2009 Goi Peace Award (Japan) in honor of his scientific contribution to world harmony.
teaser: Learning how to use your thoughts and perceptions to turn on and off genetic markers is one of the biggest breakthroughs in science today. Groundbreaking cellular biologist Bruce H. Lipton explores this remarkable possibility, and more.

title: Bruce H. Lipton on the Biology of Belief
body:
“We are facing imminent extinction.” So says cellular biologist Bruce H. Lipton, Ph.D., at the beginning of this astonishingly important conversation. The next 90 minutes are spent discussing why he thinks this is true and what humans must do if we wish to avoid this fate.

Dr. Lipton talks about the human impact on nature, four eras of historical civilization, four “myths of the apocalypse,” and the important recognition that if our belief systems aren’t working, then we need to change the way we think.  He speaks, also, of the individual’s role in change – of how our genes and DNA do not control our biology, but rather how DNA is controlled by signals from outside the cell, including the energetic messages emanating from our positive and negative thoughts. He describes the power of our perceptions and, especially, our interpretations to control our genetics.  

Dr. Lipton is an internationally recognized leader on the connection between science and spirit. His ground-breaking discoveries in the field of new biology and epigenetics are the foundation for understanding human evolution. The information in this conversation could radically change the way you live your life, as has been the case for so many people who have heard him speak.
teaser: “We are facing imminent extinction.” So says cellular biologist Bruce H. Lipton, Ph.D., at the beginning of this astonishingly important conversation. The next 90 minutes are spent discussing why he thinks this is true and what humans must do if we wish to avoid this fate.

title: Andrew Cohen on Enlightenment Amid Chaos
body:
Andrew Cohen is an internationally respected spiritual teacher, cultural visionary, and founder of the global nonprofit organization EnlightenNext. Through his writings, teachings and ongoing dialogues with leading philosophers, scientists and mystics, he has become known as one of the defining voices of the new evolutionary spirituality. 

In addition to his work as a teacher, Cohen is also dedicated to changing the cultural conversation about the purpose and significance of spiritual enlightenment in our time. He spoke with Lisa Garr about the challenges of modern life and how we might achieve enlightenment in the midst of chaos. 

Cohen has authored numerous books, including My Master Is My Self and the more recent Evolutionary Enlightenment: A New Path to Spiritual Awakening, with a forward by Deepak Chopra.
teaser: An internationally respected spiritual teacher and cultural visionary, Andrew Cohen has become known as one of the defining voices of the new evolutionary spirituality.

title: Andrew Cohen on Evolutionary Enlightenment
body:
Is meditation the only way to achieve a state of enlightenment? Can you even be enlightened in today’s busy, Internet-driven world? Modern spiritual teacher Andrew Cohen believes the answer to these powerful questions lies in revealing your authentic self.

Author of Evolutionary Enlightenment: A New Path to Spiritual Awakening and editor-in-chief of the award-winning EnlightenNext magazine, Cohen defines enlightenment as waking up to your deepest, most authentic self to participate in the conscious creation of the future. In this intriguing interview, Cohen shares how to achieve this kind of practical spirituality without feeling like you are being split in several different directions.
 
The first step? Learn to live with non-duality: the belief that we are one. Then, practice Cohen's five fundamental tenets, practical laws that help you incorporate this belief into your everyday life, and get you on the path to enlightenment in the Digital Age.
teaser: Learn how to reveal your authentic self to achieve enlightenment.

title: Mitch Battros on the Sun's Influence on Climate Change
body:
Could the sun – not greenhouse gases – be the reason for climate change? What is the true cause of the Earth's cyclical weather events? Can we predict extreme weather events such as earthquakes, tornadoes and hurricanes?

Find out with thought-provoking author and solar flare expert Mitch Battros, one of the leading researchers of the sun’s causal effects on the earth’s weather patterns. With severe weather events seemingly on the rise, Battros also shares how ancient Mayan texts and the latest scientific findings are connected.

Broadcaster and founder of Earth Changes Media, Mitch Battros presents fascinating, and sometimes shocking, research from the world's top scientists. After years of dialogue with these experts, he published his first two books -- Solar Rain: The Earth Changes Have Begun and Global Warming: A Convenient Disguise, which has played a major role in shifting the scientific communities understanding of the Sun-Earth Connection.
teaser: Could the sun – not greenhouse gases – be the reason for climate change? What is the true cause of the Earth's cyclical weather events? Can we predict extreme weather events such as earthquakes, tornadoes and hurricanes?

title: Paul Stamets on the Healing Power of Mushrooms
body:
Paul Stamets has been a dedicated mycologist for more than thirty years. Over this time, he has discovered and coauthored four new species of mushrooms, and pioneered countless techniques in the field of edible and medicinal mushroom cultivation. In this remarkable conversation, Paul described the surprising healing power of mushrooms.

Paul Stamets received the 1998 Bioneers Award from The Collective Heritage Institute, and the 1999 Founder of a New Northwest Award from the Pacific Rim Association of Resource Conservation and Development Councils. In 2008, Paul received the National Geographic Adventure Magazine's Green-Novator and the Argosy Foundation's E-chievement Awards. He was also named one of Utne Reader's 50 Visionaries Who Are Changing Your World in their November–December 2008 issue. In February 2010, Paul received the President's Award from the Society for Ecological Restoration: Northwest Chapter, in recognition of his contributions to ecological restoration.
teaser: Explore the healing power of mushrooms with master mycologist Paul Stamets.

title: Joan Borysenko on Resilience in Times of Change
body:
When faced with life's challenges, why do some people bounce back easily while others stay stuck? Joan Borysenko explains how you can master the important life skill called resilience, sharing her tips for facing reality head-on, mastering improvisation and finding deeper meaning in life.

Joan Borysenko, Ph.D., is a distinguished pioneer in integrative medicine and a world-renowned expert in the mind/body connection. She is a Harvard-trained medical scientist, licensed psychologist and New York Times bestselling author, with more than a dozen books to her credit. Her work has been foundational in an international health-care revolution that recognizes the role of meaning, and the spiritual dimensions of life, as an integral part of health and healing. Regina Meredith interviewed Joan in this fascinating conversation.
teaser: When faced with life's challenges, why do some people bounce back easily while others stay stuck? Joan Borysenko explains how you can master the important life skill called resilience.

title: Suzy Miller on Lessons from Autism
body:
The causes of autism are hotly debated among doctors, parents and society at large. Could children labeled as Autistic simply be vibrating at a different frequency? Suzy Miller, author of Awesomism: A New Way to Understand the Diagnosis of Autism, thinks so. 

Once a seasoned pediatric speech pathologist, Suzy experienced a breakthrough realization while working with a 4-year-old child diagnosed with autism. Today, she works with children and families bringing awareness to the various energies that make these children tick, providing clear insight and direction regarding vibrational sensitivities and how they affect the emotional, mental and physical aspects of the human condition.

Suzy also developed The New Human Experience Project, a revolutionary process designed to support shifts in consciousness and higher expressions of one’s true self.
teaser: The causes of autism are hotly debated among doctors, parents and society at large. Could children labeled as autistic simply be vibrating at a different frequency? Suzy Miller thinks so.

title: Carol Ritberger on Healing with Inner Wisdom
body:
Carol Ritberger Ph.D., is a radio host, author and an innovative leader in the fields of personality behavioral psychology and behavioral medicine. With more than 28 years of experience as an internationally renowned medical intuitive, Carol's expertise is in helping people understand how personality, as well as emotional, psychological and spiritual energy can lie at the root cause of illness, disease, and life crises. 

As the result of a near-death experience in 1981, she is able to see the human energy system, the aura, to identify energy congestion, protrusions, depletions and blockages that are affecting the body's ability to function properly and sustain good health. Using this skill she is able to offer a comprehensive picture of why we become ill and offer insight into what is needed to heal.

Don’t miss Carol’s fascinating conversation with Regina Meredith.
teaser: Can we heal ourselves by harnessing our own emotional, psychological and spiritual energy? Carol Ritberger, expert in behavioral medicine, shares her insight.

title: Lynne McTaggart on the Power of Intention
body:
Lynne McTaggart is a best-selling author, researcher and lecturer whose work has been described as “a bridge between science and spirituality.” In this sparkling conversation, she shares her understanding of the connectedness of all things and of the power to harness our thoughts and intentions to change the world.

Lynne is the award-winning author of six books, including the international bestselling sensations The Field, The Intention Experiment and The Bond. She has been featured in the acclaimed documentary I AM, and also on national TV shows and radio shows, including Oprah Winfrey and Deepak Chopra.
teaser: Lynne McTaggart, best-selling author, researcher and lecturer, shares her understanding of the connectedness of all things and of the power of our thoughts and intentions.

title: Jean Slatter on Manifesting a Happy Life
body:
The secret to success lies in your divine nature, says creative mystic Jean Slatter. She explained to Regina Meredith how you can call on higher powers to command wisdom, well-being and abundance in your life.

Jean Slatter is an accomplished author and inspirational speaker. In 2005 she published her landmark book Hiring the Heavens, which introduced a unique perspective on connecting with the power of the heavens to fulfill your daily and life goals. Jean is also the founder of the Creative Mystic program, which teaches holistic healing modalities and spiritual philosophies intended for self-growth and assisting others on their paths to wholeness.
teaser: The secret to success lies in your divine nature, says creative mystic Jean Slatter, author of Hiring the Heavens.

title: Barbara Marx Hubbard on Co-Creating Change
body:
Can we, as a society, evolve by choice, not by chance? Absolutely, says social innovator Barbara Marx Hubbard, author of Conscious Evolution: Awakening the Power of Our Social Potential. In this mind-opening conversation, Barbara helps us prepare for humanity’s new era of infinite possibility.

In 1945 the United States dropped atomic bombs on Japan, and the world caught its breath. This pivotal event deeply impacted the young Barbara Marx Hubbard, who found herself asking President Eisenhower, "What is the meaning of our power that is good"? Barbara's inquiry of 40-plus years, and the answers she has found, offer invaluable assistance to us all at this time in our history. Despite the state of the world, we are truly on the threshold of great possibility, of our own conscious evolution.

Barbara Marx Hubbard is a prolific author, visionary, social innovator, evolutionary thinker and educator. She is co-founder and chairperson of the Foundation for Conscious Evolution. She is the producer and narrator of the award-winning documentary series entitled Humanity Ascending: A New Way through Together and has recently partnered with The Shift Network as a global ambassador for the conscious evolution movement; a shift from evolution by chance towards evolution by choice.
teaser: Can we, as a society, evolve by choice, not by change?

title: Caroline Sutherland on Body Wisdom
body:
What if the solutions to your health issues were as plain as the nose on your face? Medical intuitive Caroline Sutherland, author of The Body Knows series, shares how to see what your body wants you to know.  In a fascinating and valuable conversation, Caroline explained to Lisa Garr how we can tune in to our bodies to take charge of our health.

Caroline Sutherland is an internationally recognized medical intuitive, radio host and innovative leader in the fields of nutrition and energy medicine. She’s the popular author of The Body Knows book series and creator of a wide range of products that focus on health, well-being and healthy aging. For the past 30 years, she has lectured around the world on the subject of health education and medical intuition, and her intuitive impressions have made a difference in thousands of people’s lives.
teaser: Medical intuitive Caroline Sutherland reveals how to tune in to your body to see what your body wants you to know.

title: Eric Pearl on Beyond Energy Healing
body:
Can a frequency-based modality alter both the receiver’s and healer’s brain state? Yes, according to healer Eric Pearl, author of The Reconnection: Heal Others, Heal Yourself. 

Eric Pearl is a doctor and internationally recognized healer. As a doctor, Eric ran a highly successful chiropractic practice for 12 years. Patients soon reported receiving miraculous healings from a multitude of serious diseases and other afflictions, just from the healing power of his hands. Based in Los Angeles, Eric elicits great interest from top doctors and medical researchers at hospitals, colleges and universities worldwide.
teaser: Can a frequency-based modality alter both the receiver’s and healer’s brain state? Yes, according to healer Eric Pearl.

title: Michael Tellinger on Utopia
body:
Is it time to rethink a society based on money? Author and researcher Michael Tellinger envisions a new kind of community, one that thrives on people’s contributions to the greater good.

Michael Tellinger, author, scientist, explorer, has become a real-life Indiana Jones, making groundbreaking discoveries about ancient vanished civilizations at the southern tip of Africa. His continued efforts and analytical scientific approach have produced stunning new evidence that will force us to rethink our origins and rewrite our history books.
teaser: Author and researcher Michael Tellinger discusses his vision for a society built on the common good.

title: Caroline Sutherland on Weight Loss
body:
Who hasn’t struggled to lose weight? Medical intuitive Caroline Sutherland shared practical solutions to increase your energy, balance your hormones and best of all, drop pounds (without counting calories) during an interview with Lisa Garr.

Caroline Sutherland is an internationally recognized medical intuitive, radio host and innovative leader in the fields of nutrition and energy medicine. She’s the popular author of The Body Knows book series and creator of a wide range of products that focus on health, well-being and healthy aging. For the past 30 years, she has lectured around the world on the subject of health education and medical intuition, and her intuitive impressions have made a difference in thousands of people’s lives.
teaser: Find out how you can tune in to your body's needs to help manage your weight.

title: Eric Pearl on Miracle Healings
body:
Did you know spontaneous remissions account for 22 percent of all breast cancer cases? It’s no surprise to healer Eric Pearl, author of The Reconnection: Heal Others, Heal Yourself. In a conversation with Lisa Garr, he explained how hands-on healing is possible.

A doctor and internationally recognized healer, Eric ran a highly successful chiropractic practice for 12 years. Patients soon reported receiving miraculous healings from a multitude of serious diseases and other afflictions, just from the healing power of his hands. Based in Los Angeles, Eric elicits great interest from top doctors and medical researchers at hospitals, colleges and universities worldwide.
teaser: Hear how hands-on healing is possible with healer Eric Pearl.

title: Brooks Palmer on Clutter Busting
body:
Clutter is anything that no longer serves you, including things, people and activities. Regina Meredith sat down with Brooks Palmer, author of two practical Clutter Busting books, who shared how to break the emotional hold stuff may have on you.

Brooks Palmer helps people get rid of things they no longer need. Using compassion, awareness and humor, he helps thousands of clients rid their lives of clutter and let go of things that no longer serve them. Brooks is the author of Clutter Busting, Letting Go of What’s Holding You Back and Clutter Busting Your Life: Clearing Physical and Emotional Clutter to Reconnect with Yourself and Others.
teaser: Hear how clearing physical clutter helps create emotional clarity.

title: David Francis on Relationship Rx
body:
What’s the secret to a lasting relationship? In this interesting interview with Regina Meredith, expert David Francis explained the energetic differences between men and woman, plus shares practical tips to increase intimacy in all your relationships.

Author of Partners in Passion: Exploring the New Energy Paradigm of Man/Woman Relationships David Price Francis is a teacher, consultant and coach in the dynamics of self-development and inter-personal relationships. He is a gifted and charismatic speaker on the purpose and meaning of spiritual growth and development in our daily lives.
teaser: Learn how men and women differ in their approaches to relationships and what you can do about it.

title: Pam Peeke on Food Addiction
body:
Resisting a craving takes more than just willpower. What’s really going on? Pam Peeke, a physician and nutrition expert, explains how to retrain your brain to make healthier choices in this enlightening interview with Lisa Garr.

Dr. Pamela Peeke is an internationally recognized physician, scientist and New York Times best-selling author in the fields of nutrition, stress, fitness and public health. Combining her energy, wit and humor with the latest scientific data, Dr. Peek motivates and educates audiences of all ages to transform their lives toward healthy living.
teaser: Learn how your brain functions on junk food versus healthy food.

title: Carol Bowman on Children’s Past Lives
body:
Young children around the world are spontaneously remembering incredible details of their past lives. Researcher Carol Bowman, an expert in the reincarnation field, discusses this fascinating subject with Regina Meredith.

Carol Bowman, M.S. is an internationally known author, lecturer, counselor, past life regression therapist and pioneer in reincarnation studies.  Her first two books, Children’s Past Lives and Return from Heaven are now classics in the reincarnation field, and have been published and read around the world in 16 foreign editions.
teaser: Learn more about the past lives of children from an expert in the reincarnation field.

title: Cynthia James on Your Extraordinary Essence
body:
Overwhelmed, overworked and over-committed? Inspirational teacher Cynthia James shared how to become more conscious and reveal the exceptional you inside during an interview with Regina Meredith.

One of today’s best-loved inspirational leaders and teachers, has uniquely combined the creative arts with innovative therapeutic techniques to bring powerful personal growth and expansion to individuals of all ages, cultures and lifestyles. She also teaches workshops based on her award-winning book, What Will Set You Free to women in prisons.
teaser: Hear from one of today's best-loved inspirational teachers.

title: John Kinyon on Nonviolent Communication
body:
Relationships, whether professional or personal, are bound to experience conflict. In an interview with Regina Meredith, mediator John Kinyon shared the language, skills and principles you can use to resolve these issues peacefully.

John Kinyon mediates conflict and trains people in communication and conflict resolution skills around the world. He specializes in NVC mediation—applying the language, skills and principles of Nonviolent Communication (NVC) to mediating conflict within oneself, with others and others who are in conflict.
teaser: Learn how to settle differences peacefully with communication expert John Kinyon.

title: Jim Robbins on Why Trees Matter
body:
In an interview with Regina Meredith, New York Times science writer Jim Robbins explained why these vanishing plants provide so much more than shade.

Jim Robbins is a New York Times science writer whose writing interests fall into two main camps: the environment and the human central nervous system. He considers the fact that he has been able to freely indulge his curiosity and get paid for it, one of his greatest accomplishments. .
teaser: Hear how trees can curb climate change, clean up toxic waste, even decrease depression.

title: Laura Alden Kamm on the Shift in Modern Medicine
body:
How is Applied Energy Medicine changing the way diseases are diagnosed? Medical intuitive Laura Alden Kamm discussed the growing intersection of Western and alternative medicine modalities in an interview with Regina Meredith. 

Called a “walking MRI” for her laser-like accuracy in structural and medical intuitive assessments, Laura Alden Kamm is a popular radio guest and the host of Laura Kamm Live. Her book, Intuitive Wellness, and audio programs, Unlocking Your Intuitive Power: How to Read the Energy of Anything and Color Intuition, explore the importance of one’s personal experience within the realms of science and spirituality.
teaser: Hear how Applied Energy Medicine is changing the way we treat disease.

title: Manjir Samanta-Laughton on Time and the Genius Groove
body:
Does quantum physics hold the key to understanding consciousness? Dr. Manjir Samanta-Laughton, author of Punk Science, shared her ideas on the subject in an interview with Regina Meredith.

An international speaker and author, Dr. Manjir Samanta-Laughton trained as a medical doctor and GP in London. During medical school, she had an unexpected spiritual awakening or kundalini experience. Since then, she has been on a quest to link ideas in the cutting edge of science with spirituality.
teaser: Dr. Manjir Samanta-Laughton, author of Punk Science, shared her ideas on quantum physics and the key to understanding consciousness.

title: The Truth about Dieting
body:
Do the foods we eat keep us stuck in the diet trap? Filmmakers James Colquhoun and Laurentine ten Bosch (Food Matters, Hungry for Change) revealed what the food industry doesn’t want you to know in an interview with Lisa Garr.

Pioneers in the field of nutrition and internationally renowned filmmakers (Hungry for Change) James Colquhoun and Laurentine ten Bosch join with leading experts to offer proven strategies to lose weight, prevent and reverse disease, and optimize health.
teaser: Do the foods we eat keep us stuck in the diet trap?

title: Michael Beckwith on Activating Your Soul’s Potential
body:
Co-create the life you want. Author Michael Beckwith, founder of Agape International Spiritual Center, shared his Life Visioning process for manifesting your potential.

Michael Bernard Beckwith is the founder and spiritual director of the Agape International Spiritual Center in Los Angeles, author of the award-winning book, Spiritual Liberation, and most recent releases that include, Life Visioning: A Transformative Process for Activating Your Unique Gifts and Highest Potential and Transcendance Expanded (a book and CD compilation).
teaser: Co-create the life you want.

title: Michael Tamura on You Are the Answer – Part 1
body:
What if your soul came with an owner’s manual? Spiritual healer Michael Tamura shared his ideas for living your life to your full spiritual potential in an interview with Lisa Garr.

A spiritual teacher, healer and clairvoyant, Michael Tamura has guided the souls of thousands of men, women and children through his powerful classes, seminars and client sessions for three decades. The release of his award-winning inspirational first book, You Are the Answer, launched Michael’s teaching and healing work into an even greater sphere of international influence.

To view a continuation of this conversation, click here.
teaser: What if your soul came with an owner’s manual?

title: Marianne Williamson on Divine Compensation
body:
What is the secret to creating abundance? Spiritual author Marianne Williamson shared her wisdom on having faith in a successful financial future during an interview with Lisa Garr.

An internationally acclaimed spiritual author and lecturer, Marianne Williamson has had six of her ten published books become New York Times Best Sellers. Four of these have been #1 New York Times Best Sellers. A Return to Love is considered a must-read of The New Spirituality. A paragraph from that book, beginning "Our deepest fear is not that we are inadequate. Our deepest fear is that we are powerful beyond measure..." is considered an anthem for a contemporary generation of seekers.
teaser: What is the secret to creating abundance?

title: James Van Praagh on Communication from Beyond
body:
What can we learn from the spirit world? Well-known medium James Van Praagh shares how to connect with our loved ones who have passed on in this interview with Lisa Garr.

The New York Times bestselling author of Unfinished Business, Ghosts Among Us and Talking to Heaven, James Van Praagh is considered a pioneer in the mediumship movement and has been the voice of the spirit world for more than twenty-five years. He also is co-executive producer of the hit CBS primetime series Ghost Whisperer, starring Jennifer Love Hewitt.
teaser: What can we learn from the spirit world? Well-known medium James Van Praagh shares how to connect with our loved ones who have passed on.

title: Energetic Synthesis of Being with Dain Heer
body:
Can you help your body heal itself? Absolutely, according to Dain Heer, the creator of an energetic healing process that helps you use your intuition to feel better, who discussed his system with Lisa Garr.

Dain Heer, D.C., is an international speaker, author and facilitator of advanced workshops worldwide. His transforming points of view on change, bodies, sex and relationship transcend everything currently being taught. He is the creator of The Energetic Synthesis of Being, a unique energy process for healing that teaches people to tap into and recognize their own abilities and knowing.
teaser: Can you help your body heal itself? Absolutely, according to Dain Heer, the creator of an energetic healing process that helps you use your intuition to feel better.

title: Grief Relief with Aurora Winter
body:
Loss is a part of life, but you can dramatically shorten the time you spend grieving. Learn how from Aurora Winter, founder of the Grief Coach Academy, in this remarkable interview with Lisa Garr.

Formerly a film and TV executive producer, Aurora Winter is America’s leading expert at empowering people to go From Heartbreak to Happiness®.  Aurora is the Founder of the Grief Coach Academy, which is the first coach-training school devoted exclusively to training coaches how to coach their clients through grief.
teaser: Loss is a part of life, but you can dramatically shorten the time you spend grieving. Learn how from Aurora Winter, founder of the Grief Coach Academy.

title: Old Hollywood with Stephen Simon
body:
What happens when a Hollywood insider decides to make movies that exalt the human spirit? Film producer Stephen Simon shares his inspiring journey in this compelling interview with guest host Jay Weidner.

Born into a successful Hollywood family, Stephen Simon grew up during the big studio heyday of the late forties and fifties. He has produced such acclaimed projects as the Academy Award–winning What Dreams May Come (starring Robin Williams and Cuba Gooding Jr.)  and the classic Somewhere in Time (starring Christopher Reeve and Jane Seymour). In 2004, he co-founded The Spiritual Cinema Circle, a monthly DVD subscription service that distributes four spiritually-themed films a month.
teaser: What happens when a Hollywood insider decides to make movies that exalt the human spirit? Film producer Stephen Simon shares his inspiring journey.

title: Dream University with Marcia Wieder
body:
To help you achieve your personal and professional dreams, Marcia Wieder, who coaches Jack Canfield, joins Lisa Garr for a memorable interview.

A syndicated columnist for the San Francisco Chronicle and founder and CEO of Dream University, Marcia Wieder is known for giving inspiring talks to notable companies such as AT&T, The Gap and American Express. She is also the renowned author of fourteen books dedicated to achieving your dreams, including Making Your Dreams Come True, Life Is But a Dream, Dreams Are Whispers from the Soul, and Doing Less and Having More.
teaser: Do what you love and the money will follow.  Marcia Wieder, who coaches Jack Canfield, shares practical tips and resources for achieving your personal and professional dreams.

title: The Inside Scoop on Healing with Dr. Hyla Cass
body:
Looking for guidance on combining the best of mainstream and natural medicine? Acclaimed integrative doctor Hyla Cass, M.D., co-author of 8 Weeks to Vibrant Health, shares the tools you need to take charge of your health in this interview with Lisa Garr.

Hyla Cass, M.D., is a physician and expert in integrative medicine, psychiatry and addiction recovery. She combines the best of natural medicine with modern science in her clinical practice and appears regularly on TV, radio and has been quoted in many national magazines.
teaser: Looking for guidance on combining the best of mainstream and natural medicine? Dr. Hyla Cass, acclaimed integrative medicine expert, shares the tools you need to take charge of your health.

title: Inspired Filmmaking with Mikki Willis
body:
Can viral videos transform how people treat each other? Absolutely, says filmmaker Mikki Willis, in this inspirational interview with Lisa Garr.

As the founder and CEO of Elevate, Mikki Willis has produced more than 200 independent productions, ranging from network television shows and theatrical features, to music videos and viral media. The recipient of the 2008 Conscious Life Humanitarian Award, Mikki Willis was named one of five “progressive thinkers on the leading edge” by Ventana Magazine.
teaser: Can viral videos transform how people treat each other? Absolutely, says filmmaker Mikki Willis.

title: You Are the Answer with Michael Tamura – Part 2
body:
Does your spirit live on after your body dies? Spiritual healer Michael Tamura talks candidly about his near-death experiences in an interview with Lisa Garr.

A spiritual teacher, healer and clairvoyant, Michael Tamura has guided the souls of thousands of men, women and children through his powerful classes, seminars and client sessions for three decades. The release of his award-winning inspirational first book, You Are the Answer, launched Michael’s teaching and healing work into an even greater sphere of international influence.

To view the beginning of this conversation, click here.
teaser: Does your spirit live on after your body dies? Spiritual healer Michael Tamura talks candidly about his near-death experiences.

title: The Four Agreements with don Miguel Ruiz, Sr.
body:
It's been more than 15 years since don Miguel Ruiz, Sr., published the best-selling The Four Agreements. In this compelling interview with Lisa Garr, hear him describe how his guide to spiritual awareness has changed thousands of lives.

Author of The Four Agreements, don Miguel Ruiz, Sr., was born into a family of healers and raised in rural Mexico by a curandera (healer) mother and nagual (shaman) grandfather. He embraced his family's centuries old legacy of healing and is now known around the world for his teachings of esoteric Toltec knowledge.
teaser: It's been more than 15 years since don Miguel Ruiz, Sr., published the best-selling The Four Agreements. Hear how his guide to spiritual awareness has changed thousands of lives.

title: The Five Levels of Attachment with don Miguel Ruiz, Sr., and don Miguel Ruiz, Jr.
body:
Don Miguel Ruiz, Jr., author of The Five Levels of Attachment, carries on the work of his father, don Miguel Ruiz, Sr., explaining how we attach ourselves inappropriately to beliefs that cause suffering. Don't miss Lisa Garr’s rare and fascinating interview with father and son.

Author of The Four Agreements, don Miguel Ruiz, Sr., was born into a family of healers and raised in rural Mexico by a curandera (healer) mother and nagual (shaman) grandfather. He embraced his family's centuries old legacy of healing and is now known around the world for his teachings of esoteric Toltec knowledge.

Don Miguel Ruiz, Jr. is a Nagual, a Toltec Master of Transformation.  He is a direct descendant of the Toltecs of the Eagle Knight lineage and is the son of don Miguel Ruiz, Sr.  By combining the wisdom of his family’s traditions with the knowledge gained from his own personal journey, he now helps others realize their own path to personal freedom.
teaser: Don Miguel Ruiz, Jr., author of The Five Levels of Attachment, carries on the work of his father, don Miguel Ruiz, Sr., explaining how we attach ourselves inappropriately to beliefs that cause suffering. Don't miss this rare interview with father and son.
cast: don Miguel Ruiz, Sr., don Miguel Ruiz, Jr.

title: Lose the Weight, Not Yourself with Colette Baron-Reid
body:
Do people with too much empathy have trouble losing weight? Yes, says intuitive counselor Colette Baron-Reid, author of Weight Loss for People Who Feel Too Much, in this vital interview with Lisa Garr.

Colette Baron-Reid is an internationally renowned intuitive counselor, educator and best-selling author who helps others recognize and connect with their own intuition, potential and purpose. She is also a powerful motivational speaker, charismatic broadcast personality and acclaimed performer, storyteller and recording artist.
teaser: Do people with too much empathy have trouble losing weight? Yes, says intuitive counselor Colette Baron-Reid, author of Weight Loss for People Who Feel Too Much.

title: Soul Coaching with Denise Linn
body:
Can spiritual teachings from indigenous cultures show us how to be true to ourselves? Denise Linn, founder of International Institute of Soul Coaching, shares her thoughts with Lisa Garr in this enlightening interview.

Founder of the International Institute of Soul Coaching, Denise Linn is a healer, teacher and author known for drawing on wisdom from indigenous cultures around the planet, including the aborigines of Australia, the Zulu in Africa, the Maori of New Zealand and her own Native American roots.
teaser: Can spiritual teachings from indigenous cultures show us how to be true to ourselves? Denise Linn, founder of International Institute of Soul Coaching, shares her thoughts.

title: Your Brain on God with Mark Waldman
body:
Does spiritual belief actually change the human brain? Therapist Mark Waldman discusses how meditation, spirituality and prayer can alter the way the brain functions for the better, in this enlightening interview with Lisa Garr.

Mark Robert Waldman teaches executive communication, stress reduction, and mindfulness to Executive MBA students at Loyola Marymount University, Los Angeles. As the author of 12 books, including Words Can Change Your Brain, he is considered to be a leading authority on spirituality and the brain.
teaser: Does spiritual belief actually change the human brain? Therapist Mark Waldman discusses how meditation, spirituality and prayer can alter the way the brain functions – for the better.

title: The Cowboy Nutritionist with Don Tolman
body:
Are whole foods the secret to optimal health? Yes, says nutritionist Don Tolman, in an interview with Lisa Garr.

Don Tolman is known as the Whole Food Medicine Cowboy, because for 17 years he searched the world and let nothing get in his way of hunting down the lost wisdom of the ancients, which has been kept hidden from the masses:  the truths about the real potential of human beings. His passion is sharing how to use whole, natural foods and nature’s gifts to their fullest potential to help people become well again, vital and energized.
teaser: Are whole foods the secret to optimal health? Yes, says nutritionist Don Tolman.

title: Pet Psychic with Amelia Kinkade
body:
Can we communicate with animals on a higher level? Amelia Kinkade assures us we can. Kinkade shares the secrets to how we can better connect with our four-legged friends in this fascinating interview with Lisa Garr.

Amelia Kinkade, author of Straight from the Horse’s Mouth: How to Talk to Animals and Get Answers, is an international speaker who lectures in 10 to 15 countries a year. Her true passion is assisting animal rescue organizations, and she trouble-shoots problems in sanctuaries all over the world. Amelia’s unique abilities have been the focus of hundreds of magazine and newspaper articles world-wide.
teaser: Can we communicate with animals on a higher level? Amelia Kinkade assures us we can. In this fascinating interview, Kinkade shares the secrets to how we can better connect with our four-legged friends.

title: Fearless Living with Guy Finley
body:
Can humanity live in a world without fear? Guy Finley, a leading expert on positive living and human potential, reveals his essential laws of fearless living and explains how we can lead the way to a higher, more authentic life in this open-hearted interview with Lisa Garr.

Guy Finley is the acclaimed author of The Secret of Letting Go and The Essential Laws of Fearless Living, and he is also the Director of Life of Learning Foundation, the non-profit self-realization school in Merlin, Oregon. For more than 30 years, best-selling author Guy Finley has dedicated his life to showing sincere seekers the authentic path to a fearless life.
teaser: Can humanity live in a world without fear? Guy Finley, a leading expert on positive living and human potential, reveals his essential laws of fearless living and explains how we can lead the way to a higher, more authentic life.

title: Change Your Story, Change Your Life with Barnet Bain
body:
We all have our own story – but what happens when we decide to change it? Success consultant Barnet Bain reveals the power behind changing our "story," and the freedom associated with letting go of our personal limitations in this enlightening interview with Lisa Garr.

Barnet Bain is an award-winning movie producer, director, and creativity coach.   Select film credits include Oscar-winner What Dreams May Come (producer), triple Emmy nominee Homeless to Harvard (executive producer), The Celestine Prophecy (writer, producer), and The Lost and Found Family (director). He is co-host of Cutting Edge Consciousness Radio on KVTA AM Talk Radio in Southern California.
teaser: We all have our own story – but what happens when we decide to change it? Success consultant Barnet Bain reveals the power behind changing our "story," and the freedom associated with letting go of our personal limitations.

title: Destined for Greatness with Lisa Nichols
body:
What tools do you need for the life you want to achieve? Breakthrough specialist Lisa Nichols shares her formula for greatness, and reveals what's needed in order to gain inspiration, leadership and ultimately, transformation in life in this motivating interview with Lisa Garr.

Lisa Nichols is CEO of Motivating the Masses, one of the top training and development companies in the world. Her extraordinary story of transforming her own life is the inspiration behind her bold mission to teach others that it is possible to do the same.
