Coined as The Breakthrough Specialist, her powerful message of empowerment, service, gratitude and excellence has impacted the lives of millions through her non-profit foundation, Motivating the Teen Spirit.
teaser: What tools do you need for the life you want to achieve? Breakthrough specialist Lisa Nichols shares her formula for greatness, and reveals what's needed in order to gain inspiration, leadership and ultimately, transformation in life.

title: The Pleasure Principle with Dr. Sara Gottfried
body:
Reclaim balance, restful sleep, sex drive and whole-body vitality: Author Dr. Sara Gottfried shares her tips and tricks for finding your natural hormone equilibrium and celebrating your life's mission with passion and purpose in this interview with Lisa Garr.

Author of the NY times bestseller, The Hormone Cure, Dr. Sara Gottfried is a Harvard-trained M.D. with 20-plus years of experience who seeks to help women feel sexy, vital and balanced from their cells to their souls. Her development of the Gottfried Protocol focuses on root-cause analysis, because the greatest health transformations are triggered when you address the root cause, not the signs.
teaser: Reclaim balance, restful sleep, sex drive and whole-body vitality: Author Dr. Sara Gottfried shares her tips and tricks for finding your natural hormone equilibrium and celebrating your life's mission with passion and purpose.

title: The Parenting Coach with Susan Stiffelman
body:
What would it look like to parent without the power struggle? Therapist, author and advice columnist Susan Stiffelman discusses key tools for effective parenting in this must-see interview with Lisa Garr. An advocate of raising cooperative, connected and capable children, Stiffelman reveals ways parents can minimize resistance and maximize joy in the journey of parenthood.

Susan Stiffelman, author of Parenting Without Power Struggles and weekly advice columnist for Huffington Post Parents, is known for her down-to-earth, parent-friendly advice on raising cooperative, connected and resilient children. Her mission is to help parents raise kids who are joyful, resilient and authentically themselves – without the various thieves of joy that can interfere with the ability to enjoy the journey of parenthood.
teaser: What would it look like to parent without the power struggle?  Therapist, author and advice columnist Susan Stiffelman, an advocate of raising cooperative, connected and capable children, reveals ways parents can minimize resistance and maximize joy in the journey of parenthood.

title: The Money Miracle with Dain Heer
body:
Is your money situation everything you want it to be? Dain Heer, co-creator of Access Consciousness, discusses how you can change your limitations around receiving money and open yourself to true and lasting financial success. Heer shares the tools and information needed to change your outlook, your finances, and more than you ever thought possible, in this rewarding interview with Lisa Garr.

Dain Heer, D.C., is an international speaker, author and facilitator of advanced workshops worldwide. His transforming points of view on change, bodies, sex and relationship transcend everything currently being taught. He is the creator of The Energetic Synthesis of Being, a unique energy process for healing that teaches people to tap into and recognize their own abilities and knowing.
teaser: Is your money situation everything you want it to be? Discover how you can change your limitations around receiving money and open yourself to true and lasting financial success.

title: How Men Think with Alison Armstrong
body:
We've all heard it: men are from Mars, women are from Venus. But what if there were a newer, less divided way of looking at gender differences? In this eye-opening interview with Lisa Garr, gender expert Alison Armstrong shares her groundbreaking way of relating to men, and how we should cultivate partnerships rather than conflicts.

Alison Armstrong has been designing and leading transformational programs for adults for over 20 years. After four years of studying men, she created the Celebrating Men, Satisfying Women workshop to share her extraordinary findings with women across the nation. With her friend Joan McClain, she founded PAX Programs Incorporated with the mission of altering society’s culture by transforming the way women relate to men.
teaser: We've all heard it: men are from Mars, women are from Venus. But what if there were a newer, less divided way of looking at gender differences?

title: How Women Think with Alison Armstrong
body:
To understand a woman is to make her even more intriguing: so says gender expert Alison Armstrong. Armstrong illuminates the core of women’s behavior as she explains the secrets behind how women think, feel, communicate, and relate to themselves and others, in this enlightening interview with Lisa Garr.

Alison Armstrong has been designing and leading transformational programs for adults for over 20 years. After four years of studying men, she created the Celebrating Men, Satisfying Women workshop to share her extraordinary findings with women across the nation. With her friend Joan McClain, she founded PAX Programs Incorporated with the mission of altering society’s culture by transforming the way women relate to men.
teaser: To understand a woman is to make her even more intriguing; so says gender expert Alison Armstrong.

title: Healing Yoga with Chelsea Roff
body:
As an eating disorder survivor, a former foster care kid and an emerging voice in the yoga world, Chelsea Roff is a force to be reckoned with. Here, in this riveting interview with Lisa Garr, she shares her intensely personal story of overcoming adversity and gives practical tools for cultivating resilience, no matter how bad circumstances get.

Chelsea Roff is an author, speaker, and yoga instructor with an academic background concerning the effects of stress on mental, emotional, and social health as well as the effects of mind-body practices on chronic immune diseases.  Her story of recovering from anorexia and a subsequent stroke was recently showcased on Sanjay Gupta’s CNN show, Human Factors, and on the front page of AOL.com.
teaser: As an eating disorder survivor, a former foster care kid and an emerging voice in the yoga world, Chelsea Roff is a force to be reckoned with. Here she shares her intensely personal story of overcoming adversity, and gives practical tools for cultivating resilience, no matter how bad circumstances get.

title: The Neuroscience of Success with John Assaraf
body:
Can mastering your own brain make you rich? According to John Assaraf, it can. In his interview with host Lisa Garr, Assaraf asserts that you already know the things you should be doing to make more money — you’re just not doing them. It all comes down to the power your conditioned mind has over you, and how you can reprogram your brain for success.

John Assaraf is a serial entrepreneur, brain researcher, and CEO of PraxisNow, a brain-research company that creates some of the most powerful evidence-based brain retraining tools and programs in the world. A relentless explorer of consciousness and human behavior, John’s passion is discovering and teaching people how to release the mental blockages that hold them back from achieving their fullest potential.
teaser: Can mastering your own brain make you rich? According to John Assaraf, it can. He asserts that you already know the things you should be doing to make more money — you’re just not doing them.

title: Electrify with the Alkaline Diet with Dr. Robert Young
body:
The primary force in the body is electricity, and sickness and disease are signs of our natural current meeting resistance. Nutrition expert Dr. Robert Young shares with us valuable insight and practical tips for keeping our current flowing through electrolytes, juicing and an alkaline diet, in this insightful interview with Lisa Garr.

Over the past two and a half decades, Robert O. Young has been widely recognized as one of the top research scientists in the world. Throughout his career, his research has been focused at the cellular level. Having a specialty in cellular nutrition, Dr. Young has devoted his life to researching the true causes of disease, subsequently developing The New Biology to help people balance their life.
teaser: The primary force in the body is electricity, and sickness and disease are signs of our natural current meeting resistance. Nutrition expert Dr. Robert Young shares with us valuable insight and practical tips for keeping our current flowing through electrolytes, juicing and an alkaline diet.

title: Body Ecology Diet with Donna Gates
body:
If you're experiencing pain, discomfort, or chronic fatigue, you could be suffering from an imbalance of yeast in the body. Nutrition expert Donna Gates discusses the malady of candida, and what you can do to restore your health and rebuild your immunity, in this important interview with Lisa Garr.

Donna Gates’ groundbreaking work has been instrumental in transforming the natural foods industry by introducing the natural sweetener stevia to the U.S., and then educating society on the value of coconut oil. She is the author of The Body Ecology Diet, a revolutionary system of healing in response to the major deficiencies in medicine and the commonplace approach to treating symptoms while ignoring root causes.
teaser: If you're experiencing pain, discomfort, or chronic fatigue, you could be suffering from an imbalance of yeast in the body. Find out what you can do to restore your health and rebuild your immunity.

title: The Tao of Food with Ron Teeguarden – Part 1
body:
We live in an era where much of what we encounter is unnatural, especially within our food supply. But our modern era also gives us unprecedented access to natural products never-before available. In his interview with Lisa Garr, herbalist Ron Teeguarden discusses the philosophy and technique behind the use of Chinese herbs, and how we can integrate these ancient principles into our modern medicine.

Ron Teeguarden is the co-founder of Dragon Herbs and author of two books, Chinese Tonic Herbs and The Ancient Wisdom of the Chinese Tonic Herbs. As a professional practitioner of the holistic Asian health arts since the 1970s, he teaches that it is better to promote our health and well-being than to become sick and forced to take remedial measures.
teaser: Herbalist Ron Teeguarden discusses the philosophy and technique behind the use of Chinese herbs, and how we can integrate these ancient principles into our modern medicine.

title: The Tao of Food with Ron Teeguarden – Part 2
body:
Impatience, anxiety, irritability: we’ve all felt the effects of stress. Luckily, there are plants from all over the world that can reduce our sensitivity to stress. In this informative interview with Lisa Garr, herbalist Ron Teeguarden shares with us some of the world’s most powerful adaptogenic herbs, where to get them, and how to use them.

Ron Teeguarden is the co-founder of Dragon Herbs and author of two books, Chinese Tonic Herbs and The Ancient Wisdom of the Chinese Tonic Herbs. As a professional practitioner of the holistic Asian health arts since the 1970s, he teaches that it is better to promote our health and well-being than to become sick and forced to take remedial measures.
teaser: Impatience, anxiety, irritability: we’ve all felt the effects of stress. Luckily, there are plants from all over the world that can reduce our sensitivity to stress. Herbalist Ron Teeguarden tells us what they are, where to get them, and how to use them.

title: Proof of Heaven with Eben Alexander
body:
As a highly trained neurosurgeon, Dr. Eben Alexander argued that near-death experiences were impossible – until he experienced one first-hand. In this fascinating interview with Lisa Garr, Dr. Alexander recounts his journey beyond this world, and his return as a changed man.

Dr. Eben Alexander, author of Proof of Heaven, is a renowned academic neurosurgeon who spent 54 years honing his scientific worldview. Everything changed the day his life-threatening battle with a rare bacterial meningitis threw him into a seven-day coma. When he woke, the Near-Death Experience (NDE) he'd had--while his neocortex was completely shut down--challenged him to reconsider everything he thought he knew about consciousness and the brain. He has spent the last five years reconciling his rich spiritual experience with contemporary physics and cosmology.
teaser: As a highly trained neurosurgeon, Dr. Eben Alexander argued that near-death experiences were impossible – until he experienced one first-hand.

title: The Gift of Laughter with Yakov Smirnoff
body:
According to Yakov Smirnoff, laughter is more than just a human response; it’s a gauge of a happy relationship. The Russian expat comedian has spent the last several decades delivering the gospel of laughter. In his interview with host Lisa Garr, Smirnoff shares his story, his anecdotes, and his mission for spreading the gift of glee.

Yakov Smirnoff is a popular name in the entertainment scene having starred in movies, sitcoms and late night talk shows. He is also a professor at Drury University where teaches about the relationship of love and laughter. His passion is helping people extend their honeymoon stage of their relationships and fall in love and laughter all over again.
teaser: According to Yakov Smirnoff, laughter is more than just a human response; it’s a gauge of a happy relationship. The Russian expat comedian has spent the last several decades delivering the gospel of laughter.

title: Quantum Learning with Bobbi DePorter
body:
Students today of all ages are facing more stress than they ever have before with heavier academic schedules, lengthy state testing and increased social pressures. What is being done to support the modern day burdens of today’s youth? Educator Bobbi DePorter asked herself the same questions 35 years ago and has changed the lives of over ten million students. Here she discusses her mission in depth with host Lisa Garr.

Bobbi DePorter, author of Quantum Learning and The 8 Keys of Excellence, is an early pioneer in the applications of accelerated learning. Her SuperCamp summer enrichment program and the educational tools of the 8 Keys of Excellence have helped children realize their personal greatness.
teaser: Students today of all ages are facing more stress than they ever have before with heavier academic schedules, lengthy state testing and increased social pressures. What is being done to support the modern day burdens of today’s youth?

title: Exotic Natural Remedies
body:
David Wolfe, a top authority on natural foods, introduces us to exotic foods, herbal tinctures and supplements from around the world, explaining their various health benefits. Many of these foods may not be readily available at your local grocer, and have strange names, but their restorative powers have been known to healers since time immemorial.  He explains how you can prepare and use these superfoods to tap into nature’s solution for your health. 

David Wolfe has been an advocate of raw food, superfoods, superherbs and natural health for 22 years. A bestselling author, he coaches Hollywood celebrities and business people on nutrition and wellness. He is considered by his peers as one of the leading authorities in nutrition.
teaser: David Wolfe, a top authority on natural foods, introduces us to exotic foods, herbal tinctures and supplements from around the world, explaining their various health benefits

title: Techniques of Joyful Awareness with Richard Moss
body:
What if you could clear your mind of habitual stories and reveal a state of joyful, present-moment awareness? Best-selling author Richard Moss teaches people how to delve deeply into their core being to discover what he calls “radical aliveness.” Moss reveals the steps for embarking on a profound journey of self-inquiry and discovery in an interview with Lisa Garr.

In 1977 Richard Moss was a practicing physician when he experienced a spontaneous state of illumination that irreversibly changed his life. His understanding of human consciousness and behavior was profoundly transformed. Thus began a period of introspection and contemplation of dreams. Now, his teaching is a path of transformation and conscious living that is accessible to anyone.
teaser: What if you could clear your mind of habitual stories and reveal a state of joyful, present-moment awareness? Best-selling author Richard Moss teaches people how to delve deeply into their core being to discover what he calls “radical aliveness.”

title: The EarthKeeper Alliance with Adam C. Hall
body:
A real estate tycoon experiences a personal transformation and goes from earth conqueror to earth keeper. It may sound like the makings of a movie, but this is the real-life story of Adam C. Hall, chairman of The EarthKeeper Alliance. In his interview with host Lisa Garr, Hall discusses his unyielding passion for restoring/ keeping the earth and its inhabitants.

Adam C. Hall was an investment-banker and real estate developer when an unconventional and unexpected 'mid-life crisis radically altered his relationship to the earth. Now, he is the Chairman and Founding Steward of Earthkeeper Alliance Inc. Earthkeeper's 501c3 Urban Gardens, educates youths, their families and communities to grow, eat and sustain their own food and nourishment through local gardens. Connecting youth to the Earth through Urban Gardens will build community and healthy food!
teaser: A real estate tycoon experiences a personal transformation and goes from earth conqueror to earth keeper. It may sound like the makings of a movie, but this is the real-life story of Adam C. Hall, chairman of The EarthKeeper Alliance.

title: Quantum Lightweaving with Kenji Kumara
body:
We've all heard the famous Gandhi quote, "Be the change you wish to see in the world." Now meet an individual who embodies this notion and helps others to do the same. Visionary Kenji Kumara acts as a bridge between ascended energies of the masters and humans on Earth, and shares his inspiration and his own golden rules with host Lisa Garr.

Kenji Kumara has over forty years in the healing arts field. As a messenger and visionary for the New Earth consciousness he serves as a bridge between worlds and a catalyst for quantum states of being. He has dedicated his life to assisting those who are ready to experience a deeper connection with unconditional love.
teaser: Visionary Kenji Kumara acts as a bridge between ascended energies of the masters and humans on Earth, and shares his inspiration and his own golden rules with host Lisa Garr.

title: Power of Self-Healing with Fabrizio Mancini
body:
The human body has an incredible ability to heal itself. In fact, as much as 50% of all human illnesses heal themselves. Dr. Fabrizio Mancini is a practicing doctor of chiropractic and the author of The Power of Self-Healing. Here he shares his scientific findings with host Lisa Garr.

Dr. Fabrizio Mancini, author of The Power of Self-Healing and Four Steps for Living a Fabulous Life, is a self-healing expert. After nine years in private practice, Dr. Mancini was chosen to lead Parker University in 1999, becoming one of the youngest presidents of a college or university. Dr. Mancini’s tireless efforts to improve lives have been recognized with numerous honors.
teaser: The human body has an incredible ability to heal itself. In fact, as much as 50% of all human illnesses heal themselves, as related by Dr. Fabrizio Mancini, a practicing doctor of chiropractic and the author of The Power of Self-Healing.

title: Intuitive Healing with Inna Segal
body:
Science has shown that 90% of illnesses are stress related. A major source of that stress comes from our minds and the negative thoughts that wreak havoc on our bodies. Energetic healer Inna Segal joins host Lisa Garr in an interview to reveal how to clear those negative thoughts and emotions in order to claim responsibility for our own well-being.

Inna Segal, author of The Secret of Life Wellness, is the creator of Visionary Intuitive Healing. As an internationally recognized healer she can “see” illness and blocks in a person's body by intuitive means, explain what is occurring, and guide people through self-healing processes. Inna Segal dedicates herself to assisting others in their journey of self-healing and empowerment.
teaser: Science has shown that 90% of illnesses are stress related. A major source of that stress comes from our minds and the negative thoughts that wreak havoc on our bodies. Energetic healer Inna Segal reveals how to clear those negative thoughts and emotions in order to claim responsibility for our own well-being.

title: Journey Back to Health with Danette May
body:
Healthy lifestyle expert Danette May believes that fast food, fad diets and busy schedules have led to America’s obesity epidemic. Her no-nonsense solutions can be found in Eat, Drink and Shrink, her cookbook designed for today’s busy lifestyles, using five ingredients or less. More than just a healthy cook, May spreads her healthy inspiration worldwide through fitness and mind-body wellness. Here she shares her tips, tricks and secrets in an interview with host Lisa Garr, and offers sound advice for those who don’t know how or where to begin their journey back to health.

Danette May is the Founder of Mindful Health, LLC, which provides the tools, knowledge, and inspiration so that millions of people around the world can look and feel their best while living more healthy lives. As a certified fitness professional, Pilates instructor, and nutritionist for 13 years, she has changed the lives of thousands of people.
teaser: Healthy lifestyle expert Danette May believes that fast food, fad diets and busy schedules have led to America’s obesity epidemic. Her no-nonsense solutions can be found in Eat, Drink and Shrink, her cookbook designed for today’s busy lifestyles.

title: Finding Lifelong Vitality with Anat Baniel
body:
Remember a time when your body felt strong and flexible, and free from aches and pains? Now you can have it back. With more than 80% of U.S. adults suffering from neck and back pain, Anat Baniel set out on a mission to create a cutting-edge Neuromovement method of accessing, the remarkable power of the brain to change thus transforming the true source of pain and limitations. Here she shares her research and findings with host Lisa Garr.

Best Selling author of Move into Life and Kids Beyond Limits, Anat Baniel is a leader in the field of NeuroMovement. She has developed a revolutionary movement/brain change approach that is supported by recent brain plasticity research. Her work helps both adults and children work through pain and limitations to achieve new levels of performance.
teaser: Remember a time when your body felt strong and flexible, and free from aches and pains? Now you can have it back.

title: Fierce Environmentalism with Mark Kitchell
body:
What does it mean to be an environmentalist? Director and writer Mark Kitchell answers that question in his award-winning film A Fierce Green Fire. His moving documentary is an account of the largest movement of the 20th century: the environmental movement. Bringing together the major elements of environmentalism, Kitchell’s aim is to connect us all to the environment on a personal, national and global level, focusing on activism and a fight for the future of humanity. Here he discusses his passion and his work with host Lisa Garr.

Director, producer and writer Mark Kitchell is best known for the documentary Berkeley in the Sixties, which was nominated for an Academy Award. In the twenty years since that film was made, Kitchell has worked in non-fiction television, made films for hire, taught at UC Santa Cruz, done freelance production and developed A Fierce Green Fire.

Watch the documentary A Fierce Green Fire
teaser: What does it mean to be an environmentalist? Director and writer Mark Kitchell answers that question in his award-winning film A Fierce Green Fire.

title: The Auto-Immune Answer with Mee Tracy McCormick
body:
Over half a million people in the U.S. today are burdened with Crohn’s disease, and author Mee McCormick was one of them. When her debilitating condition began to cost her all quality of life, she decided to fight back. In her new book, My Kitchen Cure, McCormick shares her amazing discoveries on the healing powers of food, and creates a lifestyle that will help anyone suffering from any form of auto-immune disease. She shares her valuable insights with Lisa Garr.

Auto-immune cooking expert and author Mee Tracy McCormick first started living a real food life as a last resort. Being diagnosed with multiple medical conditions was bad enough, but the treatments threatened to kill her before she could be cured. So, she went to her kitchen and learned how to combine foods in a way that was delicious and helped to promote health in the body.
teaser: Over half a million people in the U.S. today are burdened with Crohn’s disease, and author Mee McCormick was one of them.

title: A New Paradigm for Politics with Marianne Williamson
body:
America is having a new conversation about politics, and Marianne Williamson is vying to be its spokesperson: She is running for a seat in the U.S. House of Representatives. Williamson is making it her mission to challenge the current traditional system by merging spirituality, progress and politics. Here she shares her mission and vision with Lisa Garr.

Internationally acclaimed spiritual author and lecturer, Marianne Williamson has four #1 books on the New York Times Best Sellers list. Her latest book is titled, The Law of Divine Compensation. In 1989, she founded Project Angel Food to bring meals to homebound people with AIDS in the Los Angeles area. She also founded the Department of Peace Campaign, a grass roots campaign to establish a United States Department of Peace.
teaser: America is having a new conversation about politics, and Marianne Williamson is vying to be its spokesperson: She is running for a seat in the U.S. House of Representatives.

title: Rewriting the Genetic Code with Dr. Mario Martinez
body:
They say age ain’t nothing but a number. So, what if 90 were the new 50? And what if we could completely rewrite our own genetic code? Dr. Mario Martinez is diving headfirst into these questions. As a clinical neuropsychologist, Dr. Martinez is making startling discoveries in the realm of biocognitive science. Here he shares some of his findings with host Lisa Garr.

Dr. Mario Martinez, a clinical neuropsychologist, developed the theory of biocognitive science in 1998 to investigate the causes of health and the learning of illnesses. It has become a new paradigm for understanding how cultural beliefs can affect health and longevity. He lectures worldwide explaining the discoveries made that link culture and health.
teaser: They say age ain’t nothing but a number. So, what if 90 were the new 50? And what if we could completely rewrite our own genetic code?

title: Creating an Extraordinary Life with Gabriel Nossovitch
body:
What’s the story that’s running your life? Is it something that you’ve been holding onto long after it’s served its purpose? Transformational trainer Gabriel Nossovitch is an expert at guiding people through the process of freeing up space and uprooting hidden blockages that may be sabotaging success. Here he shares his transformative process with host Lisa Garr.

Gabriel Nossovitch’s life-long interest in ontology, coupled with his study of consciousness and transformational technologies come together to create a unique blend of knowledge and experience. He is the co-founder of several personal transformation companies throughout Latin America that offer personal growth seminars and sponsor community service projects aimed at raising awareness in underprivileged populations in the Americas.
teaser: Transformational trainer Gabriel Nossovitch is an expert at guiding people through the process of freeing up space and uprooting hidden blockages that may be sabotaging success.

title: Fine-Tuning Your Intuition with Sonia Choquette
body:
A sixth sense: we’ve all got one. Are you in tune with yours?  Intuitive Sonia Choquette has spent the last 35 years helping others get in touch with their authentic selves to discover a new fluidity and ease in life. In this insightful interview with Lisa Garr, she shares her tips and tricks on ways to chart a new course toward profound peace and deep satisfaction.    

Sonia Choquette is the author of 19 international bestselling books on intuitive awakening, personal growth, creativity, and transformational leadership, including her latest book titled, Tune In. Sonia insists that we must activate and rely on our innate sixth sense in order to make the most authentic, well-informed, healthy, and soul satisfying decisions possible.
teaser: Intuitive Sonia Choquette has spent the last 35 years helping others get in touch with their authentic selves to discover a new fluidity and ease in life.

title: The Tapping Solution with Nick Ortner
body:
Millions of people are settling for lives filled with poor health and emotional baggage. Are you one of them? If so, are you ready to regain control? Nick Ortner is on a mission to heal people using a cutting-edge modality, the Emotional Freedom Technique, which combines Chinese acupressure with modern psychology. In this interview with Lisa Garr, he shares the vital secrets for emotional wholeness and physical relief, and how you can take back your overall well-being.

Nick Ortner, author of The Tapping Solution, offers a healing modality that combines ancient Chinese acupressure and modern psychology.  The mission of his company, The Tapping Solution, LLC, is to bring simple and effective natural healing into the mainstream through the Emotional Freedom Technique.  Nick's films, CDs, online events and speaking engagements help to empower people to create healthy, financially abundant and stress-free lives.
teaser: Nick Ortner is on a mission to heal people using a cutting-edge modality, the Emotional Freedom Technique, which combines Chinese acupressure with modern psychology.

title: Creating the Life of Your Dreams with Mary Morrissey
body:
“I’d love to do that someday.” Have you ever said that about a lifelong dream or passion? Well, there are seven days in a week, and someday isn’t one of them. So goes the message of life coach Mary Morrissey. In this inspiring interview with Lisa Garr, Morrissey shows us how we can move our lifelong dreams from the backburner to the front, and create a life of self-fulfillment and ultimate joy.

Mary Morrissey’s bestselling books, Building Your Field of Dreams and No Less than Greatness, along with her transformational talks and seminars have made her one of the elite teachers in the human potential movement. She is the president and founder of LifeSOULutions, an international company providing programs and products that transform people’s dreams into reality.
teaser: In this inspiring interview, Morrissey shows us how we can move our lifelong dreams from the backburner to the front, and create a life of self-fulfillment and ultimate joy.

title: Unbinding the Heart with Agapi Stassinopoulos
body:
How would your life be different if you knew your story mattered? In her new book Unbinding the Heart, author, speaker and Huffington Post regular Agapi Stassinopoulos invites readers on a journey of inner exploration to reconnect with their true selves. In her interview with Lisa Garr, she talks about the many transition periods we face in our lives, and how we can rework what’s not working for us.

As an inspiring teacher, Agapi Stassinopoulos conducts seminars all over the world to empower men and women to recognize their individual gifts and create the lives they want. She is a frequent blogger for The Huffington Post. Her latest book is titled Unbinding the Heart: A Dose of Greek Wisdom, Generosity, and Unconditional Love.
teaser: Agapi Stassinopoulos invites readers on a journey of inner exploration to reconnect with their true selves. She talks about the many transition periods we face in our lives, and how we can rework what’s not working for us.

title: Dreaming Heaven with Lee McCormick
body:
Are you ready for a journey through the pathways of time, truth and consciousness? That’s what author and documentarian Lee McCormick set out to do with his film, Dreaming Heaven. Here he talks about the inspiration behind his powerful documentary that takes viewers to the 4,000-year-old epicenter of spiritual transformation in Teotihuacan, Mexico.

Lee McCormick, coauthor of Dreaming Heaven, has always lived out loud. In the late ‘70s and ‘80s, Lee hit the road as a singer-songwriter until he realized he had an out-of-control drug problem. In rehab, he had a profound awakening and set out on a personal quest to find real truth and healing in his life. His inward journey took him to shamans and healers who opened him up to a universal view of life and a new paradigm for addiction treatment.
teaser: Lee McCormick talks about the inspiration behind his powerful documentary, Dreaming Heaven, which takes viewers to the 4,000-year-old epicenter of spiritual transformation in Teotihuacan, Mexico.

title: Changing Your Reality with Niurka
body:
You are what you think. So says Niurka, a professional speaker and transformational leader. Niurka’s teachings are based on the principle that the quality of your life mirrors the quality of the questions you pose. In this motivating interview with Lisa Garr, she shares how you can change your questions to change your reality.

Niurka is a transformational leader and communication expert who educates, inspires, and empowers people to live purposefully and powerfully. For nearly two decades she has devoutly researched and synthesized the most effective strategies on the planet in leadership, peak performance, and self mastery. Since establishing her company in 2000, Niurka has taught tens of thousands of people to elevate the way they think, speak, and ultimately how they live.
teaser: You are what you think. So says Niurka, a professional speaker and transformational leader.

title: How to Talk So You Can Be Heard with Bill Stierle – Part 1
body:
How to communicate is one of the most important skills you can learn. In this remarkable interview with Lisa Garr, communication Specialist Bill Stierle shares how to use your whole brain to resolve conflicts, express your emotions, and have your thoughts truly be heard.

Bill Stierle is a communication specialist who has been working with individuals, couples, and families for more than 25 years. He has coached thousands of people and has taught numerous workshops locally and nationally on topics that address the concerns about personal and professional effectiveness, relationships, and parenting. The material Bill presents is designed for people who want to create more ease and effectiveness within their relationships, both at home and work.
teaser: Communication Specialist Bill Stierle shares how to use your whole brain to resolve conflicts, express your emotions and have your thoughts truly be heard.

title: How to Talk So You Can Be Heard with Bill Stierle – Part 2
body:
In Part 2 of this interview with Lisa Garr, communication Specialist Bill Stierle continues to discuss effective ways to communicate, explaining the significance of feelings, needs, and requests when talking with coworkers, friends, and family. 

Bill Stierle is a communication specialist who has been working with individuals, couples, and families for more than 25 years. He has coached thousands of people and has taught numerous workshops locally and nationally on topics that address the concerns about personal and professional effectiveness, relationships, and parenting. The material Bill presents is designed for people who want to create more ease and effectiveness within their relationships, both at home and work.
teaser: Communication Specialist Bill Stierle continues to discuss effective ways to communicate, explaining the significance of feelings, needs and requests when talking with coworkers, friends and family.

title: Decoding Karma with Joe Nunziata
body:
Karma: many are familiar with the concept, but few truly understand its power. What if you could tap into your ultimate karmic power to clear the negative energy that’s holding you back? In this enlightening interview with Lisa Garr, author and spiritual teacher Joe Nunziata shares how we can identify and release the behavioral patterns that are preventing us from living the life we were meant to live.  

Joe Nunziata is a bestselling author, professional speaker, spiritual teacher and life and business coach. He delivers his life-changing message through enlightening programs that are a unique blend of spirituality, psychology, philosophy and the power of internal energy. Joe teaches that to make permanent changes you must clear your negative energy and break destructive patterns of behavior at the core level. This transformational process creates new energy and beliefs designed to help you achieve sustained positive growth in all areas of your life.
teaser: Karma: many are familiar with the concept, but few truly understand its power. What if you could tap into your ultimate karmic power to clear the negative energy that’s holding you back?

title: Secrets to Intuitive Success with William Whitecloud
body:
A gut feeling. Your sixth sense. Somehow, you just know. That's your intuition talking. Join William Whitecloud, best-selling author (The Magician's Way, Secrets of Natural Success, & The Last Shaman), in this life-changing interview with Lisa Garr. He outlines how you can tap into your intuition and make your dreams a reality through the law of attraction.
William Whitecloud’s secrets of personal development and association with magic go way back to his childhood. In adulthood, he traded commodities and speculated on global financial money markets. Soon, he had a mentor who used esoteric methods to predict market movements, and his childhood fascination with hidden forces was reignited. After studying Hermetic Philosophy and the ideas of Robert Fritz he founded a program called Living from Greatness. This personalized course is dedicated to empowering participants in discovering their higher self and living their authentic nature and potential. Get a second chance at living the life you want with creative development trainer William Whitecloud.

William Whitecloud’s association with magic goes way back to his childhood. In adulthood, he traded commodities and speculated on global financial money markets. Soon, he had a mentor who used esoteric methods to predict market movements and his childhood fascination of hidden forces was reignited. After studying Hermetic Philosophy and the ideas of Robert Fritz he founded a program called Living from Greatness, a personalized course dedicated to empowering participants in discovering and living their authentic nature and potential.
teaser: Join William Whitecloud, author of The Magician's Way, as he outlines how you can tap into your intuition and follow this innate guidance for a more successful life.

title: Astrology Zone for 2014 with Susan Miller
body:
The ancient science of astrology studies the movements of the planets through the signs to better understand the influence that they may have on our lives. In this enlightening interview, Susan Miller, founder and editor of AstrologyZone.com, shares what’s in store for each sign in 2014 and recommends how best to use this knowledge for planning an amazing life.

Susan Miller is an internationally known astrologer, author, and columnist who has appeared on popular television news programs and been interviewed by major newspapers. She is the author of eight books, including the best-selling Planets and Possibilities. She is also a contributing editor of several popular magazines.
teaser: Susan Miller, founder and editor of AstrologyZone.com, shares what’s in store for each sign in 2014 and recommends how best to use this knowledge for planning an amazing life.

title: Activate Your Higher Brain with Michael Cotton
body:
We may be using only five percent of our higher brain, or prefrontal cortex, which controls our higher reasoning abilities and enables us to unlock our potential to find meaning in our lives.  In this stimulating interview, Dr. Michael Cotton explains the gentle-touch technique he developed to change the physiology of your brain and transform all areas of your life.

Michael Cotton is a leading evolutionary theorist and the founder of Higher Brain Living with more than thirty years as an authority in personal and cultural trans-formation. He has a doctoral degree in chiropractic, and is the creator of the revolutionary Higher Brain Living Technique, which creates a surge of energy into the higher brain, awakening human potential, for a lifetime of lasting joy, passion and purpose.
teaser: We may be using only five percent of our higher brain, or prefrontal cortex, which controls our higher reasoning abilities and enables us to unlock our potential to find meaning in our lives.

title: Break Bad Habits for Good with Dain Heer
body:
What if you could have the awareness of everything while judging nothing? In this illuminating interview, Access Consciousness co-creator Dain Heer shares practical ways for letting go of what people think and ridding yourself of the bad habits that hold you back from living a conscious life.

Dain Heer, DC, is an international speaker, author and facilitator of advanced workshops worldwide. His transforming points of view on change, bodies, sex and relationship transcend everything currently being taught. He is the creator of The Energetic Synthesis of Being, a unique energy process for healing that teaches people to tap into and recognize their own abilities and knowing.
teaser: What if you could have the awareness of everything while judging nothing? Dain Heer shares practical ways for letting go of what people think and ridding yourself of the bad habits that hold you back from living a conscious life.

title: Angelic Dreams with Kaya
body:
Through our dreams, we dive into the heart of our memories and communicate with our deepest subconscious. But what if we were also communicating with a realm beyond our own? In this evocative interview, dream interpreter and angelic communicator Kaya shares how we can unlock the secrets to decoding the true meaning of our dreams by connecting with the angelic realm.

Kaya, the founder, chairman and CEO of Universe/City Mikaël, a multinational non-profit organization, is a spiritual teacher, author, and international lecturer on angels. He is also a specialist in dream and symbol interpretation in more than 43 countries. His profound spiritual knowledge is a source of inspiration for millions of people on the planet.
teaser: Through our dreams, we dive into the heart of our memories and communicate with our deepest subconscious. But what if we were also communicating with a realm beyond our own?

title: 10 Things to Know Before You Go with Dannion Brinkley
body:
Is there life after death? After nearly escaping death on multiple occasions, Dannion Brinkley wrote several books on what it’s like to begin the journey to the next realm. His true story Near-Death Experiences (NDEs) have led him to develop a compassionate attitude toward the dying, and he’s transformed this compassion into his 30+ years of health care service as a hospice volunteer. In this enlightening interview, Brinkley shares the 10 things people should know before they pass over.

An internationally renowned author and speaker in the field of spirituality, self-development, and complementary and alternative medicine, Dannion Brinkley is the author of three new age bestsellers: Saved by the Light, At Peace in the Light, Secrets of the Light, and Ten Things to Know Before You Go: How the Secrets of the Afterlife Can Transform Your Life Now. He founded The Twilight Brigade, Compassion in Action, a national organization that helps recruit and train hospice volunteers. In addition, he has experienced three of the most complete NDEs ever recorded.
teaser: After nearly escaping death on multiple occasions, Dannion Brinkley wrote several books on what it’s like to begin the journey to the next realm.

title: Zen and the Art of Business with John Murphy
body:
In today’s rapidly changing business climate, those who are the most creative, innovative and open to new ideas are the most successful. Whether you work for yourself, are a part of a small business or a large corporation, do you feel like changes are needed? In this interview taped live at the 2014 Conscious Life Expo, author and business consultant John Murphy shares why he believes today’s business leaders have a lot to learn from the ancient practice of Zen, and explains why a corporate cultural change is imperative for success.  

John J. Murphy has evolved from quarterbacking football at Notre Dame to quarterbacking conscious business and personal improvement worldwide. Murphy is an award-winning author of 18 books, including Zentrepreneur: Get Out of the Way and Lead. His esteemed list of clientele includes numerous Fortune 500 companies.
teaser: In today’s rapidly changing business climate, those who are the most creative, innovative and open to new ideas are the most successful. Author and business consultant John Murphy shares why he believes today’s business leaders have a lot to learn from the ancient practice of Zen.

title: Bridging the Political Divide with Marianne Williamson
body:
America is on the edge of a new paradigm in politics. With her campaign for a seat in the U.S. House of Representatives, Marianne Williamson plans on carrying this new paradigm all the way to Washington. In this motivating interview taped live at the 2014 Conscious Life Expo, Williamson shares her vision for mobilizing this new political movement, and describes her plans for bridging the gap between politics and spirituality.  

Internationally acclaimed spiritual author and lecturer Marianne Williamson has four #1 books on the New York Times Best Sellers list. Her latest book is titled, The Law of Divine Compensation. In 1989, she founded Project Angel Food to bring meals to homebound people with AIDS in the Los Angeles area. She also founded the Department of Peace Campaign, a grass roots campaign to establish a United States Department of Peace.
teaser: America is on the edge of a new paradigm in politics. With her campaign for a seat in the U.S. House of Representatives, Marianne Williamson plans on carrying this new paradigm all the way to Washington.

title: The Turning Point with Gregg Braden
body:
The world is experiencing erratic weather patterns that are breaking new records every day. With the dramatic increase in devastating events like floods, wildfires and Arctic blasts, a global sense of shock and awe seems to be the new norm. In this interview taped live at the 2014 Conscious Life Expo, geologist and author Gregg Braden discusses the four major climatic changes affecting the world today, and how a communal attitude of collaboration can help facilitate positive change.

Gregg Braden is a New York Times best-selling author whose pioneering work bridges science and spirituality. He has explored high mountain villages, remote monasteries, and forgotten texts in order to merge their timeless secrets with the best science of today. His latest book, The Turning Point: Creating Resilience in a Time of Extremes, calls us to recognize that every crisis can become a moment of transformation.
teaser: Geologist and author Gregg Braden discusses the four major climactic changes affecting the world today, and how a communal attitude of collaboration can help facilitate positive change.

title: A New Way to Natural Health with Mark Mincolla
body:
With today’s healthcare system in a constant state of flux, there’s no better time to empower yourself with knowledge of your body’s dynamic ability to heal itself. In this interview taped live at the 2014 Conscious Life Expo, natural health practitioner Mark Mincolla, Ph.D., describes the emergence of a new paradigm in human health, where wellness and wholeness are one, and holistic, preventative care is at the root of a successful healthcare system. 

As a natural health care practitioner, Mark Mincolla, Ph.D., has transformed thousands of lives over the past thirty years. His innovative Electromagnetic Muscle Testing system integrates ancient Chinese energy techniques with cutting-edge nutritional science. Dr. Mincolla is the author of Whole Health: A Holistic Approach to Healing for the 21st Century.
teaser: With today’s healthcare system in a constant state of flux, there’s no better time to empower yourself with knowledge of your body’s dynamic ability to heal itself.

title: The Science of the Future with Patrick Flanagan
body:
Microcluster technology, MegaHydration and Nubian Titanium Alloy Pyramids: these are just a few of the remarkable discoveries research scientist Patrick Flanagan has made in his lifetime. In this mind-boggling interview, he sat down with Lisa Garr at the Conscious Life Expo in Los Angeles to discuss his life’s work and his most recent cutting-edge discoveries.

Patrick Flanagan was a child prodigy in electronics who could read before he could talk. In 1952, he became a General Class Ham Radio Operator who designed and hand built all of his radio equipment. At 13, he invented the Neurophone which is a device that transmits sound through the skin directly to the brain. Life Magazine picked Flanagan as one of the top ten most promising upcoming scientists in the world in 1962.
teaser: Microcluster technology, MegaHydration and Nubian Titanium Alloy Pyramids: these are just a few of the remarkable discoveries research scientist Patrick Flanagan has made in his lifetime.

title: Dying to Be Me with Anita Moorjani
body:
After a three-year battle with cancer, Anita Moorjani was on death’s door with just hours to live when she arrived at the hospital on February 2, 2006. Through the powerful forces of intention and unyielding love, Anita emerged from her life-threatening coma to make a full recovery. She joins Lisa Garr for this inspiring interview, to share the transformational lessons learned from her near-death experience.

In 2006 Anita Moorjani had a near-death experience that tremendously changed her perspective on life. After working in the corporate world for many years before having her experience, she is often invited to speak at conferences and events around the globe to share her insights. Her work is now ingrained with the depths and insights she gained while in the other realm.
teaser: After a three-year battle with cancer, Anita Moorjani was on death’s door with just hours to live.

title: Meditation for a Modern World with davidji
body:
You sit down to meditate, only to be distracted by thoughts, noise or your never-ending to-do list. You yearn to be less reactive in stressful situations, have the ability to clear your mind and remain in the present moment. Does this sound like you? davidji is here to help. As the lead educator of the Chopra Center for Wellbeing, davidji has devoted his life to the art and science of meditation. In this delightful interview with Lisa Garr, davidji shares how we can fit meditation into our modern way of life.

For davidji, his dharma, or life's purpose, is to help individuals awaken to the best version of themselves and discover their finest expression in life. He has been referred to as the meditation maestro and the velvet voice of stillness with more than 250 guided meditations to his credit. Now, he travels the world sharing timeless wisdom on cultivating a spiritual practice, modern-day stress management, emotional healing techniques, work/life balance, and finding deeper fulfillment through conscious choice-making.
teaser: You sit down to meditate, only to be distracted by thoughts, noise or your never-ending to-do list. You yearn to be less reactive in stressful situations, have the ability to clear your mind and remain in the present moment.

title: Signing Your Soul Signature with Panache Desai
body:
Are you ready to take a journey past judgment, away from fear and beyond the boundaries of your comfort zone? As a member of the next generation of thought leaders, Panache Desai is making it his mission to lead us to our personal truth, where he encourages us to find – and sign – our soul signature. In this in-depth interview with Lisa Garr, Desai explains what our soul signature is, and how it can help us remain fully present for all of life’s experiences.

Panache Desai is a contemporary thought leader and author whose message of love and acceptance has drawn thousands of people from around the world to his seminars and workshops. After a profoundly transformative experience more than a decade ago, he has committed his life to being a vibrational catalyst. Not aligned with any religious or spiritual tradition, he empowers people to free themselves of pain, suffering, sadness, and self-limiting beliefs.
teaser: Are you ready to take a journey past judgment, away from fear and beyond the boundaries of your comfort zone? As a member of the next generation of thought leaders, Panache Desai is making it his mission to lead us to our personal truth.

title: A Happiness How-To with Robert Holden
body:
Life, liberty and the pursuit of happiness: they’re our inalienable rights as members of the human race. But how many of us pursue happiness and actually find it? Robert Holden, Ph.D., may have found us a shortcut. In this interview taped live at the I Can Do It event in Denver, Colorado, Holden shares his method for happiness by blending scientific research with real-life tools.

Robert Holden, Ph.D., author of Happiness NOW!, Shift Happens!, Authentic Success (formerly titled Success Intelligence) and Be Happy,  is the Director of The Happiness Project and Success Intelligence. He coaches leaders in business, education, politics and healthcare and hosts a weekly show on Hay House Radio called Shift Happens!
teaser: Life, liberty and the pursuit of happiness: they’re our inalienable rights as members of the human race. But how many of us pursue happiness and actually find it?

title: The Communication Prescription with Dr. Neha Sangwan
body:
Communication is no doubt a cornerstone of any healthy relationship. As the “Doctor of Communication,” Neha Sangwan, M.D. has made it her mission to create self-care through healthcare, and touts effective and authentic communication as her number one prescription. In this interview taped live at the I Can Do It event in Denver, Colorado, Dr. Sangwan shares ways we can learn to speak our genuine truth from the heart.

CEO and founder of Intuitive Intelligence,  Dr. Neha Sangwan is an Internal Medicine physician who speaks internationally on  topics of conflict resolution, leadership and team transition, power and hierarchy, stress management and employee wellness. She currently consults with innovative corporations and cross-functional healthcare teams. Dr. Sangwan has pioneered numerous successful programs for corporations and health professionals that improve organizational metrics.
teaser: Communication is no doubt a cornerstone of any healthy relationship. As the “Doctor of Communication,” Neha Sangwan, M.D., has made it her mission to create self-care through healthcare, and touts effective and authentic communication as her number one prescription.

title: You Are the Placebo with Dr Joe Dispenza
body:
Can people overcome habits, illness and disease through the power of thought? Maybe so, says Dr Joe Dispenza, D.C. In his most recent independent research, Dispenza observed that subjects were able to change their state of being through thought alone. Believe it or not, you are the placebo. In this interview taped live at the I Can Do It event in Denver, Colorado, Dispenza shares some of his eye-opening findings with host Lisa Garr.

Joe Dispenza, D.C., the best-selling author of Breaking the Habit of Being Yourself and Evolve Your Brain, studied biochemistry at Rutgers University. He also holds a Bachelor of Science degree with an emphasis in neuroscience, and earned his Doctor of Chiropractic from Life University in Atlanta, Georgia. He has received postgraduate training and continuing education in neurology, neuroscience, brain function and chemistry, cellular biology, memory formation, and aging and longevity. His latest book is titled, You are the Placebo.
teaser: Can people overcome habits, illness and disease through the power of thought? Maybe so, says Dr Joe Dispenza, D.C.

title: Changing Your Inner Dialogue
body:
Improving self-esteem may can be the secret ingredient to live life to its fullest. Elden Taylor talks about the inner talk we all have and how you can begin to shift this innermost dialogue to make a difference in your life. He offers stories of people who have primed their minds to make positive changes in their lives and explains how we can best make use of hard-wired connection between our minds and our limitless potential.  

Eldon Taylor is an award winning, New York Times best-selling author of more than 300 books, and audio and video programs. He is the inventor of the patented InnerTalk technology and the founder and President of Progressive Awareness Research. He has been called a “master of the mind” and has appeared as an expert witness on both hypnosis and subliminal communication.
teaser: Improving self-esteem may can be the secret ingredient to live life to its fullest. Elden Taylor talks about the inner talk we all have and how you can begin to shift this innermost dialogue to make a difference in your life.

title: Debt & Money: A Love Story with Kate Northrup
body:
With the average American consumer $15,000 in debt, it’s no wonder that many of us have a love/hate relationship with money. Entrepreneur and business coach Kate Northrup claims the solution isn’t just to spend less; it’s to change the foundation of your relationship with the almighty dollar. In this interview taped live from the I Can Do It event in Denver, Colorado, Northrup shares how we can mend our relationship with money for good.

Kate Northrup is a professional freedom-seeker and creative entrepreneur. She spent the better part of 2011 on a road trip called The Freedom Tour, which teaches financial freedom as an inroad to emotional and spiritual freedom. Her philosophy is that if you free yourself financially you can be fully present to fulfilling your purpose on the planet.
teaser: With the average American consumer $15,000 in debt, it’s no wonder that many of us have a love/hate relationship with money.

title: Our Emerging Potential with Pam Oslie
body:
Can creating the life you want be as simple as manipulating the energy around you? Maybe so, according to energy worker and intuitive Pamala Oslie. In her interview with Lisa Garr, Oslie speaks about humanity’s emerging potential, parallel universes, quantum physics, and how our thoughts can create the reality we want.

Pamala Oslie is an author, consultant, lecturer, and professional psychic with a very extensive clientele that includes many celebrities. Pamala has appeared on many television and radio shows to explain the emerging human potential, psychic abilities, auras, and the power of our beliefs to create our reality.   She has written four successful and popular books: Life Colors, Love Colors, Infinite You and Make Your Dreams Come True, and has a very extensive clientele, including many celebrities. Pam is the Founder of the Auracolors website, a site designed to help you create love, joy and fulfillment in EVERY area of your life.
teaser: Can creating the life you want be as simple as manipulating the energy around you? Maybe so, according to energy worker and intuitive Pamala Oslie.

title: The Allergy Fix with Susanne Bennett
body:
It’s time to throw away the Claritin and take back your life. Author and allergy expert Dr. Susanne Bennett, D.C., has made it her mission to help allergy sufferers cure what ails them, naturally. Combining Eastern, Western, and bio-energetic modalities, Bennett gets to the root cause of allergies to alleviate symptoms and boost the immune system. In this helpful interview, she discusses how you can rid yourself of allergies in just seven days.

As founder of the Wellness for Life Center in Santa Monica, California, Dr. Susanne Bennett, D.C., CCSP specializes in allergies, clinical nutrition, environmental and lifestyle medicine, with an emphasis in pediatric and young adult health care. She incorporates natural and lifestyle medicine, subtle immune system modulation and pays close attention to toxic emotional and mental disturbances that can manifest as physical symptoms.
teaser: It’s time to throw away the Claritin and take back your life. Author and allergy expert Dr. Susanne Bennett, D.C., has made it her mission to help allergy sufferers cure what ails them, naturally.

title: Saving Our Seas with Patricia Cori
body:
Our oceans are vast, fascinating, and in dire need of our help. As the co-founder of SaveOurSeas.org, historian and author Patricia Cori has become a powerful voice for the preservation and conservation of our Earth’s oceans. In this interview, she explains her mission in detail, and shares what we can all do to help save our seas and their inhabitants.

For more than 25 years, Patricia Cori has studied the spiritual paths of indigenous cultures, from the jungle pyramids of the ancient Mayans to the desert tombs of the Pharaohs. She has come to be recognized as a gifted shaman by indigenous teachers of the Tibetan, Mayan and Peruvian traditions. Patricia established SoulQuest Journeys in 1996 to guide travelers through sacred sites in Nepal, Tibet, Asia, Mexico, Egypt, Europe and Peru.
teaser: Our oceans are vast, fascinating, and in dire need of our help. As the co-founder of SaveOurSeas.org, Patricia Cori has become a powerful voice for the preservation and conservation of our Earth’s oceans.

title: Thyroid Therapy Revolution with Gil Kajiki
body:
Fatigued? Bloated? Depressed? It could be your thyroid. Dr. Gil Kajiki, DC, is revolutionizing the way thyroid dysfunction is handled. Combining endocrinology, immunology and blood analysis, Dr. Kajiki’s truly unique approach leaves patients feeling energized, revitalized and “finally back to normal.” In this interview, he shares how we can spot the signs of thyroid dysfunction, and what we can do to mitigate the problem.

Gil Kajiki, DC, is revolutionizing the way that hypothyroidism and Hashimoto’s Autoimmune Thyroid is handled. His relentless search to help his wife, who had been diagnosed with Hashimoto's Hypothyroid resulted in a new way to manage her symptoms. This led him to develop a truly unique approach that goes beyond thyroid replacement, and actually get to the root problem of Hashimoto's, to help his patients feel energized, vibrant, and truly feel good again.
teaser: Fatigued? Bloated? Depressed? It could be your thyroid. Dr. Gil Kajiki, DC, is revolutionizing the way thyroid dysfunction is handled.

title: Awaken Your Healing Energy with Deborah King
body:
Do you have a gift of healing?  Would you like to learn how to activate that gift inside yourself? In this remarkable interview, master energy healer Deborah King explains how we can awaken our own healing energy so we can heal ourselves and others.

New York Times best-selling spiritual teacher Deborah King is hailed as the premier Master Healer. Deborah developed her healing gifts through decades of global study, both in the classroom and in the esoteric world of healers, sages and shamans. Deborah has transformed countless lives through her popular radio show, frequent TV appearances, workshops, and books.
teaser: Do you have a gift of healing?  Would you like to learn how to activate that gift inside yourself?

title: A Unique Life Fully Lived with Karen Kain
body:
At 6 weeks old, Karen Kain’s baby, Lorrin, had an adverse reaction to her one and only DPT vaccination.  The vaccine attacked her brain, leaving her with severe brain damage. Blind, non-verbal, a quadriplegic with daily seizures, Lorrin only had the ability to blink to communicate. Karen Kain is the courageous mother who recently published a memoir called A Unique Life Fully Lived, a loving tribute to her daughter, who passed away at age 15. In this heartfelt interview, she explains how she learned the life skills to accept what was, and to embrace life’s journey.

In 1994, Karen Kain’s daughter, Lorrin was severely vaccine injured and Karen’s world fell apart. She tried everything that she could to “heal” Lorrin and give her the best life possible. When Karen made a pivotal choice to embrace Lorrin’s uniqueness and enjoy all areas of life, she was able to overcome life’s massive roadblocks. Now, Karen Kain is committed to helping children who are living a unique life experience by supporting their parents.
teaser: At 6 weeks old, Karen Kain’s baby, Lorrin, had an adverse reaction to her one and only DPT vaccination.  The vaccine attacked her brain, leaving her with severe brain damage.

title: Train Your Brain with Neurofeedback with Dr. Siegfried Othmer
body:
Wouldn’t it be great if you could work out your brain like you work out your body? Well why not? The brain can be exercised like any other muscle in the body. Neurofeedback trains the brain to balance itself and to self-regulate. In this interview, Dr. Sigfried Othmer, who has been involved in the development of the research-grade instrumentation for EEG feedback since 1987, explains how you can exercise your brain using neurofeedback.

Since 1985, Dr. Siegfried Othmer has been involved with neurofeedback as part of the brain-training of his son for seizure disorder. This training was life-transforming for his son and has directed his professional life to the development of neurofeedback as well as to the promotion of its public acceptance. He currently provides training for professionals in EEG biofeedback, and presents research findings in professional forums.
teaser: Wouldn’t it be great if you could work out your brain like you work out your body? Well why not? The brain can be exercised like any other muscle in the body.

title: The Truth Behind Hypnosis with Chris Howard
body:
One of the biggest mistakes people make about hypnosis is that you surrender control to the hypnotist, but that is the furthest thing from the truth. In this captivating interview, Chris Howard, master teacher and trainer, takes us on a journey of transformational hypnosis. He explains that all hypnosis is self-hypnosis, and he serves as a guide to help us learn our fullest sense of power and control.

Chris Howard is the owner of Academy of Wealth & Achievement, which has become one of the fastest growing personal development and training companies in the world. He is also an internationally acclaimed wealth and lifestyle strategist, the best-selling author of Turning Passions into Profits: Three Steps to Wealth and Power. Chris’ life-long mission has been to put the tools of transformation into the hands of everybody on the planet in order to create worldwide wealth through education and entrepreneurial means.
teaser: One of the biggest mistakes people make about hypnosis is that you surrender control to the hypnotist, but that is the furthest thing from the truth.

title: Qigong’s Healing Energies with Robert Peng
body:
When someone extends their knowledge to help heal you, you spend the rest of your life thanking them in many ways. This is what Qigong Master Robert Peng has done. Robert was healed when he was a little boy by a Qigong Master from a childhood heart condition, and for the following 13 years, this master taught Robert how to use our life force to restore our inner power. In this revealing interview, Robert shares this knowledge with us.

At a very young age, Robert Peng began training with a Qigong master who guided him through many life-changing experiences and intense purifications to refine his healing energies. When China began its Open Door Policy, it was finally possible for him to teach Qigong openly.  He is the author of The Master Key: The Qigong Way to Unlock Your Hidden Power as well as a number of Qigong DVDs.

[Editor's Note: Near the end of the interview, Robert Peng and Lisa Garr went outdoors to demonstrate some Qigong exercises. We're sorry the audio track was affected by the breeze, but the demonstration seems to us so lovely and useful that we hope you will enjoy it despite the noise.]
teaser: When someone extends their knowledge to help heal you, you spend the rest of your life thanking them in many ways. This is what Qigong Master Robert Peng has done.

title: Creativity on Demand with Michael Gelb
body:
What is creativity?  Can it be used by Fortune 500 companies to mitigate the effects of a failed business move or an industry slump?  Do you have to wait for inspiration to strike, or are there tools to help you access creativity when the need arises?  In this remarkable interview, Michael Gelb shares his insights into creativity, mind-mapping, and especially the seven principles that arose from his inquiries into the methods of Leonardo Da Vinci.

Michael J. Gelb is the world’s leading authority on the application of genius thinking to personal and organizational development. He is an internationally renowned author, speaker, and consultant (and, yes, juggler) who helps individuals and organizations to find innovative solutions to their most important challenges. Gelb is the author of 14 books on creativity and innovation including the international best seller, How to Think Like Leonardo Da Vinci: Seven Steps to Genius Every Day.
teaser: Michael Gelb shares his insights into creativity, mind-mapping, and especially the seven principles that arose from his inquiries into the methods of Leonardo Da Vinci.

title: The Neurodharma of Love with Rick Hanson
body:
Most of our greatest joys and sorrows arise from our relationships with others. Our days are made up of a dance that alternates between relating with others and with ourselves. If this is indeed what consumes most of our day, wouldn’t it be great if we could learn to guide our minds to forgive, heal, and find greater happiness in our connection with others? In this fascinating interview, neuropsychologist Rick Hanson teaches how brain science, practical psychology, and Buddhist meditation practices are able to help us achieve greater intimacy and fulfillment in our relationships.

Rick Hanson, Ph.D., is a neuropsychologist, Senior Fellow of the Greater Good Science Center at UC Berkeley, and New York Times best-selling author. His books include Hardwiring Happiness, Buddha’s Brain, Just One Thing, and Mother Nurture. He is the founder of the Wellspring Institute for Neuroscience and Contemplative Wisdom. Hanson’s speaking engagements include Oxford, Stanford, and Harvard as well as meditation centers worldwide.
teaser: Neuropsychologist Rick Hanson teaches how brain science, practical psychology, and Buddhist meditation practices are able to help us achieve greater intimacy and fulfillment in our relationships.

title: The Bhakti Boogie with Jocelyn Gordon
body:
What do hatha yoga, mindfulness meditation and hula hooping have in common? The uniting factor is what Jocelyn Gordon, creator of Bhakti Boogie Yoga, calls transformational fitness. With more than 25 years of experience as a movement therapist and dance enthusiast, Jocelyn is passionate about being fully self-expressed and about helping women experience liberation from something she identifies as TraumaDrama. 

Jocelyn Gordon brings the message of authentic living to her clients and programs. Her lifelong specialty, Integrative Movement Education, stems from a unique early childhood apprenticeship in massage. She provides busy women in the US and overseas with fitness and stress-relief tools which emphasize breath awareness, self-care and pleasure. Inspired by the vision of a world full of joyfully embodied beings, Jocelyn encourages everybody to move from inhibited expression to authentic living.
teaser: What do hatha yoga, mindfulness meditation and hula hooping have in common? The uniting factor is what Jocelyn Gordon, creator of Bhakti Boogie Yoga, calls transformational fitness.

title: Wisdom of the Lakota with Joseph Marshall
body:
Our current technology-loving culture celebrates and even worships youth. However, Joseph Marshall, an enrolled member of the Lakota tribe, says, “There are wise people in the world from all walks of life, from many nations and cultures. But there is one unalterable reality: No one who is truly wise is young.” In this enlightening interview with Lisa Garr, Joseph Marshall speaks about the valuable wisdom of elders and other Lakota traditional beliefs as ways to nourish our souls with spiritual wisdom.

Joseph Marshall III was born and raised on the Rosebud Sioux Indian Reservation and is an enrolled member of the Sicangu Lakota (Rosebud Sioux) tribe. Raised in a traditional Lakota household, his first language is Lakota and he knows the ancient tradition of oral storytelling. Joseph taught at the high school and college levels, and developed native studies curriculum as well. Now he writes full time and is the author of Returning to the Lakota Way and The Lakota Way of Strength and Courage.
teaser: Joseph Marshall, an enrolled member of the Lakota tribe, says, “There are wise people in the world from all walks of life, from many nations and cultures. But there is one unalterable reality: No one who is truly wise is young.”

title: Christian Mysticism in Contemporary Life with David Frenette
body:
What is prayer? Is it only talking to God when you want something or when you are desperate? Is it something you only do when you go to a place of religious belief? In this soul-searching interview with Lisa Garr, David Frenette, a senior teacher in the Centering Prayer Movement, explains this contemporary method of contemplative prayer, which was developed by Trappist monks over the past fifty years and has its origins deeply rooted in mystical Christian tradition.

David Frenette is a leader and senior teacher in the Centering Prayer movement. He co-created and co-led a contemplative retreat community and is a spiritual director for clients worldwide. David is a careful student of the Christian mystical life, having pursued it through years of prayer and solitude and, even more importantly, by having his prayer life purified, enriched, and expressed in community and in the service of others.
teaser: What is prayer? Is it only talking to God when you want something or when you are desperate? David Frenette, a senior teacher in the Centering Prayer Movement, presents a contemporary method of contemplative prayer.

title: Neurosculpting with Lisa Wimberger
body:
Lisa Wimberger experienced seizures for 25 years so severe that in many cases her heart would stop and she had to be resuscitated. It turned out that stress was a trigger. Lisa taught herself to combine meditation and neuroscience to create the process that would help her retrain her nervous system. She calls this Neurosculpting, and in this fascinating interview with Lisa Garr, she describes the techniques she teaches her clients to disarm their stress.

Lisa Wimberger holds a Masters Degree in Education from the University of Stonybrook, NY, and is the founder of the Neurosculpting® Institute. Her work draws upon her background in medical neuroscience, and she is the author of New Beliefs, New Brain: Free Yourself from Stress and Fear. Lisa runs a private meditation practice in Colorado teaching clients who suffer from stress disorders.
teaser: Lisa Wimberger experienced seizures for 25 years where in many cases her heart would stop and she had to be resuscitated. It turned out that stress was a trigger. Lisa taught herself to combine meditation and neuroscience to create the process that would help her retrain her nervous system.

title: Spiritual Science with Dr. Baskaran Pillai
body:
Dr. Pillai is a spiritual scientist, academic scholar and world thought leader who has been featured in Time magazine for his deep commitment to helping people across the globe realize their full human potential. He is an Enlightened Master from the South Indian Siddha tradition, an unbroken ancient lineage of spiritual scientists who have reached the pinnacle of human evolution. In this deeply revelatory interview with Lisa Garr, he discusses the relationships among meditation, mind, body, time and realms of reality, as well as the power of intention in the elimination of poverty.

Dr. Baskaran Pillai is an international teacher, spiritual leader, humanitarian and scholar-mystic from Southern India. Dr. Pillai is the founder of the Pillai Center for MindScience whose mission is to alleviate human pain and suffering in all forms with education geared toward enhancing human intelligence and positively transforming every aspect of life. He is the author of several books including, Life Changing Sounds: Tools from the Other Side, Miracles of the Avatar, and One Minute Guide to Prosperity and Enlightenment.
teaser: Spiritual scientist Dr. Baskaran Pillai discusses the relationships among meditation, mind, body, time and realms of reality, as well as the power of intention in the elimination of poverty.

title: Siddha Scientists with Dr. Baskaran Pillai
body:
Spiritual scientist Dr. Baskaran Pillai continues his discussion of the relationships among meditation, mind, body, time and realms of reality. In this conversation,  Dr. Pillai explains the practice of wordless transmissions between teacher and student, and the powerful meditation techniques of using soundwaves, or mantras. Essentially, he explains that through changing your mindset of consciousness, basically changing how the brain works, you can change anything that you want to change – heal your body, change your finances, fix your relationships.

Dr. Baskaran Pillai is an international teacher, spiritual leader, humanitarian and scholar-mystic from Southern India. Dr. Pillai is the founder of the Pillai Center for MindScience whose mission is to alleviate human pain and suffering in all forms with education geared toward enhancing human intelligence and positively transforming every aspect of life. He is the author of several books including, Life Changing Sounds: Tools from the Other Side, Miracles of the Avatar, and One Minute Guide to Prosperity and Enlightenment.
teaser: In this continuing conversation, Dr. Pillai explains that through changing your mindset of consciousness, basically changing how the brain works, you can change anything that you want to change – heal your body, change your finances, fix your relationships.

title: The Power of Ritual with Chris Attwood
body:
What does a CEO and senior executive for the past 30 years know about creating success through rituals? A lot, actually. Chris Attwood is the co-author of the New York Times bestseller, The Passion Test with Janet Attwood. His latest book is Your Hidden Riches: Unleashing the Power of Ritual to Create a Life of Meaning in Purpose.
