In this interview with Lisa Garr, he explains why it’s so important today for people to incorporate regular rituals into their daily lives.

Chris Attwood is co-author of the New York Times bestseller, The Passion Test – The Effortless Path to Discovering Your Life Purpose. He is an expert in the field of human consciousness and is also deeply grounded in the practical world of business.
teaser: What does a CEO and senior executive for the past 30 years know about creating success through rituals? A lot, actually. Chris Attwood explains why it’s so important today for people to incorporate regular rituals into their daily lives.

title: The Passion Test with Janet Attwood
body:
The Passion Test is a powerful tool to help you discover what you love in your life. In this fascinating interview, Janet Attwood, co-creator of The Passion Test, explores what it means to live an adventure-filled life full of passion. She describes the tools she’s developed to help you examine your own life, to figure out what it is you love to do, and to find a way for you to connect with that love and live your own deep passion.

Janet Bray Attwood is the co-author of the New York Times Bestseller, The Passion Test – The Effortless Path to Discovering Your Life Purpose. As an expert on what it takes to live a passionate life, she has presented her programs as a featured speaker to hundreds of thousands of people around the world.
teaser: The Passion Test is a powerful tool to help you discover what you love in your life. Find out what it means to live an adventure-filled life full of passion.

title: Unleashing Your Full Potential with Derek Rydall
body:
Have you ever fallen prey to a “get rich quick” scheme, only to find that it didn’t work and what you got was poor quick? Derek Rydall, an expert on the law of emergence, says it’s not about getting rich at all. How can you get something you already have? In this intriguing interview with Lisa Garr, he reveals his 7-stage process for unleashing the full potential of any project or area of your life.

Derek Rydall, author of EMERGENCE: Seven Steps for Radical Life Change, is the world’s #1 expert on the revolutionary Law of Emergence. From top executives at Fortune 500 companies to celebrities and media professionals, he has touched thousands of people around the planet with his message of finding your path, living your purpose and making a powerful impact. His weekly Podcast, Best Year of Your Life!, reveals cutting-edge spiritual principles and success strategies to achieve financial freedom and abundance, master productivity and creativity, and gain true wealth and happiness.
teaser: Have you ever fallen prey to a “get rich quick” scheme, only to find that it didn’t work and what you got was poor quick? Derek Rydall, an expert on the law of emergence, says it’s not about getting rich at all. How can you get something you already have?

title: The Ecstasy of Surrender with Judith Orloff
body:
How good are you at surrendering? Do you recognize that you cannot control everything? Can you admit that you do not always have to be right? Can you be spontaneous? Can you enjoy life and stop long enough to let in a beautiful spring day? In an in-depth interview, Lisa Garr discusses these questions and more with Dr. Judith Orloff, psychiatrist and intuition expert, who is the author of the newly released book, The Ecstasy of Surrender: 12 Surprising Ways Letting Go Can Empower Your Life.

Dr. Judith Orloff is author of the best-seller The Ecstasy of Surrender: 12 Surprising Ways Letting Go Can Empower Your Life (2014). She is an Assistant Clinical Professor of Psychiatry at UCLA who has helped patients find emotional freedom for over 20 years by proving that the links between physical, emotional, and spiritual health can't be ignored.  Dr. passionately asserts that we have the power to transform negative emotions and achieve inner peace. For more information on Dr. Orloff’s books, workshops, and online intuition course.
teaser: How good are you at surrendering? Do you recognize that you cannot control everything? Can you admit that you do not always have to be right? Can you be spontaneous?

title: Decoding Your Karma with Sandra Anne Taylor
body:
Do you ever feel “stuck”? Have you ever started down a path and then halfway through felt like you were just not going in the right direction? Are you at a crossroads in your life – perhaps in your relationship or your career? The answers may lie in your “karma,” possibly from a past life, which could be affecting your current experiences. In this interview with Lisa Garr, best-selling author Sandra Anne Taylor explains how to get unstuck and achieve real results.

Sandra Anne Taylor is the New York Times bestselling author of Quantum Success, and most recently, Your Quantum Breakthrough Code. She is an international speaker, counselor, and consultant who lectures throughout the world on the power of eternal consciousness and personal energy. In The Hidden Power of Your Past Lives, she explores the unknown past-life influences on present life patterns--revealing what you can do to change them. Her books are available in 26 languages around the globe.
teaser: Do you ever feel “stuck”? Have you ever started down a path and then halfway through felt like you were just not going in the right direction? The answers may lie in your “karma,” possibly from a past life, which could be affecting your current experiences.

title: Every Word Has Power with Yvonne Oswald Ph.D.
body:
Do you want to learn how to clear a negative thought in minutes? Would you like to discover how to change your language in 21 days? Here’s your chance, because joining Lisa for this revealing interview, is Yvonne Oswald Ph.D., a very well respected communications expert.  Yvonne pays careful attention to her words and thoughts, because, as she explains, one hundred percent of the words you say to yourself produce results.

Yvonne Oswald Ph.D., award-winning, best-selling author of Every Word has Power, now in ten languages, is at the leading edge of the new development field of Human Behavioral Technology. A council member of the Chamber of Chartered Behavioral Scientists International, Sri Lanka, Dr. Yvonne was voted 2010 Woman of Influence and Inspiration by the Government of Ontario. She is a renowned and respected International Keynote Speaker and Communications Trainer, and a Master Trainer of NLP and Hypnosis. Her U.S. National Awards include the Most Unique Contribution to the Field of Clinical Hypnosis (2012) for her work with changing self-talk.
teaser: Do you want to learn how to clear a negative thought in minutes? Would you like to discover how to change your language in 21 days?

title: The Power of Giving with Cynthia Kersey
body:
Did you know that giving is actually good for your health? As Oprah Winfrey has said, “The greatest way to self-healing is to help others.” This is exactly the path that Cynthia Kersey has chosen. She is the Chief Humanitarian Officer of the Unstoppable Foundation, which has already funded more than 56 schools and educates more than 6,000 children in Africa every single day. Cynthia’s passion is showing how each of us can solve the world’s most seemingly impossible challenges through simple individual actions. In this inspiring interview with Lisa Garr, Cynthia reveals how you can literally transform your life and your business through the power of contribution.

Cynthia Kersey is President of Unstoppable Enterprises, Inc., and the Chief Humanitarian Officer of the Unstoppable Foundation, whose mission is to ensure that every child on the planet receives access to the life-long gift of education. A leader in the transformational industry, Cynthia has penned two bestselling books, Unstoppable and Unstoppable Women, which are collections of powerful stories and strategies from people who, through perseverance and consistent action, turned obstacles into personal triumph. These books have motivated countless readers with more than 500,000 copies sold worldwide in 17 languages.
teaser: Did you know that giving is actually good for your health? As Oprah Winfrey has said, “The greatest way to self-healing is to help others.” This is exactly the path that Cynthia Kersey has chosen.

title: Live Forever or Die Trying with Bill Andrews and Molly Sheridan
body:
Would you like to live forever? What does that really mean? It can mean to live a healthy life past 1,000 years old. Does that appeal to you? It does for Bill Andrews, a molecular biologist and athlete who is committed to “curing aging” by pushing the envelope. He wants to extend human longevity using regenerative medicine. His motto is, “Live forever…or die trying.” In this inspiring interview, Bill is joined by his wife, Molly Sheridan, also an ultra-marathoner, who is on this journey with Bill for life – however long it lasts.

Dr. Bill Andrews is the President and CEO of Sierra Sciences. As a scientist, athlete and executive, he continually pushes the envelope and challenges convention. In his 32-year biotech career, he has focused on finding ways to extend the human lifespan and health-span through telomere maintenance. 

Molly Sheridan is an ultra-marathon runner, coach, public speaker, and author of Running Past Midnight. She is the CEO and Founder of Desert Sky Adventures, which organizes and manages race events ranging from a 5K run to ultra-marathons and includes coaching and training classes on exercise and nutrition.
teaser: Would you like to live forever? What does that really mean? It can mean to live a healthy life past 1,000 years old. Does that appeal to you?

title: It’s Never About the Money with Pegi Burdick
body:
Have you ever heard the phrase, “Don’t cry over anything that doesn’t cry over you”? Then why do we cry over losing money or material things? Sometimes it hurts like it is an actual loss of a person. In this revealing interview, Pegi Burdick, known as the Financial Whisperer and the author of It’s Never About the Money – Even When It Is, explains why we personify and even deify money.

Pegi Burdick has spent much of her life as the quintessential serial entrepreneur. Despite success at a variety of jobs and businesses, she struck a low point in her personal and business lives, which led her to search for causes and solutions. Her only way to recovery, she felt, was to understand why she had made such poor choices and not repeat them. She began a journey of self-awareness, pushing herself out of her comfort zone and into gaining true inner-control. That’s how she became an expert on how our emotions impact how we manage our money.
teaser: Pegi Burdick, known as the Financial Whisperer and the author of It’s Never About the Money – Even When It Is, explains why we personify and even deify money.

title: The Awakening Coach with Arjuna Ardagh
body:
Maybe you’re in a place in your life where you feel you are done searching, done looking for something outside yourself to fulfill you. You feel you’re ready to truly be free because you’ve found that what you have been looking for is already inside you. Luckily, today we have remarkable access to powerful spiritual teachings. This is causing people to become more aware and more conscious every day. In this vital interview,  Arjuna Ardagh is talking about just that – awakening. 

Arjuna Ardagh is an awakening coach, writer and public speaker, who also trains others to become facilitators of awakening. Arjuna met H.W.L. Poonja, a direct student of the celebrated sage Ramana Maharshi, in 1991, after returning to India for a prolonged period of meditation With Poonja’s help, Ardagh went through a radical shift of perspective. Now, he is the author of eight books, including the 2005 #1 National Bestseller The Translucent Revolution, which was featured in Oprah’s O magazine. His new book, Better than Sex, is the complete introduction to awakening coaching.
teaser: Arjuna Ardagh, an awakening coach who also trains others to become facilitators of awakening, talks about discovering that what you have been looking for is already inside of you.

title: Open Your Heart with Mark Nepo
body:
What does it mean to have an open heart? Do you make more decisions with your mind or your heart? And then how does the soul play into this equation? Are the soul and the heart connected? In this inspirational interview, Lisa Garr explores these questions with Mark Nepo, a poet, philosopher and cancer survivor who has been uncovering a path of spiritual inquiry for more than 40 years.

Bestselling author Mark Nepo has published fifteen books, including his number one New York Times bestseller, The Book of Awakening. His recent work includes, The Endless Practice, his latest book of poems, Reduced to Joy, and Inside the Miracle. Mark devotes his writing and teaching to the journey of inner transformation and the life of relationship. He continues to offer readings, lectures, and retreats all over the world.
teaser: What does it mean to have an open heart? Do you make more decisions with your mind or your heart? And then how does the soul play into this equation? Are the soul and the heart connected?

title: From Ashram to CEO with Amanda Holmes
body:
Amanda Holmes went from ashram to CEO at 27 years old, and her journey is both inspiring and challenging. She stepped in as CEO of Chet Holmes International after the death of her father, self-help guru Chet Holmes. In this revealing conversation, Amanda Holmes talks about the legacy her father began, along with Tony Robbins in the beginning, and how she continues to nurture businesses using intuition and a proven equation for growth.

Amanda Holmes’ singing career spanned over seven years and four records. When her father, Chet Holmes, NY Times Best Selling author, was diagnosed with Leukemia, it all came to an abrupt end. After studying alternative medicines in Asia, she took over the responsibility of her father’s business. Today, she is the CEO dedicated to not only carrying on her father’s legacy, but most of all, making a difference for business owners around the world.
teaser: Amanda Holmes went from ashram to CEO at 27 years old, and her journey is both inspiring and challenging.

title: Yoga for Addiction Recovery with Tommy Rosen
body:
Have you ever struggled with addiction? The kind that gets hold of you even as you are in denial that a problem exists? Or are you just a social drinker, who drinks seven nights a week and then that leads to more?  In this inspiring interview, Tommy Rosen, an internationally recognized yoga teacher, reveals his own descent into acute drug addiction some 23 years ago, and the tools of yoga, recovery and wellness he used to rescue himself, which he now shares with others.

Tommy Rosen has studied and practiced yoga for 20 years, and is a certified Vinyasa flow and Kundalini yoga teacher, having studied under Guru Prem. Rosen’s classes are a mixture of vigorous Vinyasa flow and powerful Kundalini kriyas. His teaching style includes movement, breath, music, sweat, meditation and plenty of joy. Rosen also uses the benefits of yoga and meditation to help people recover from addiction and to build fulfilling lives.
teaser: Tommy Rosen, an internationally-recognized yoga teacher, reveals his own descent into acute drug addiction some 23 years ago, and the tools of yoga, recovery and wellness he used to rescue himself.

title: The Love Mob with Preston Smiles
body:
Preston Smiles says, “Love will find a way, everything else will find an excuse.” He is the co-founder of The Love Mob, which is a social movement dedicated to spreading love all over the world. So if you see a giant flash mob chanting about love, you will most likely find Preston smiling along with hundreds of other Love Mobbers. In this upbeat interview, Smiles describes the methods he teaches to help turn anyone’s life into a life of love.

Preston Smiles is the Founder of The Love Mob, a social movement dedicated to connecting 3.6 billion people to the power of community through Organized Acts of Love. He is a regular contributor to many top blogs and has been featured in many magazines. He is one of the youngest members of A.T.L (Association of Transformational Leaders) founded by Jack Canfield, and with his huge social media platform, Preston is quickly becoming a household name.
teaser: Preston Smiles says, “Love will find a way, everything else will find an excuse.” He is the co-founder of The Love Mob, which is a social movement dedicated to spreading love all over the world.

title: Spirit Awakening with Akuyoe Graham
body:
Akuyoe (A-coo-yo) Graham has committed herself to teaching incarcerated youth – who feel unheard and unworthy – to have a life of purpose and dignity through her foundation called Spirit Awakening. In this powerful interview, she describes how, one child at a time, she teaches these children creative writing, meditation and using the spoken word to help build character and ultimately self-esteem.

Akuyoe Graham’s personal encounter with her transcendent inner beauty was the culmination of a long journey, which she re-enacts in her highly acclaimed one-woman play, Spirit Awakening. She is the author of the best-selling book, The Little Book of Transformation/7 Days to a Brand New You, and can be seen in the independent films Switchboard, Faith and Dreams, and The Good Wifey; and the soon to be released Ben and Ara.
teaser: Akuyoe Graham has committed herself to teaching incarcerated youth – who feel unheard and unworthy – to have a life of purpose and dignity through her foundation called Spirit Awakening.

title: The Alchemy of Voice with Stewart Pearce
body:
Everyone has a certain sound, a note, deep within us, which is attached to a certain frequency that establishes our voice. According to Stewart Pearce, sound healer and founder of The Alchemy of Voice, we slowly stop feeling that organic voice and become disconnected from it, thus moving toward disharmony. In this vibrant interview, Stewart reveals how we can reconnect with the sound of our true voice. 

Stewart Pearce is a legendary Sound Healer, Angel Medium and renowned Master of Voice who held positions at Shakespeare's Globe Theatre and the Webber Douglas Academy in London. Stewart has also developed Angelic Sound Healing processes known as The Alchemy of Voice, using the transformative energy of the voice for soul inspiration and personal development. He is the author of The Alchemy of Voice, The Angels of Atlantis, The Heart's Note, and Angels & the Keys to Paradise, alongside two award-winning Oracles, and six award-winning audio recordings.
teaser: Everyone has a certain sound, a note, deep within us, which is attached to a certain frequency that establishes our voice.

title: Messages from the Angels with Doreen Virtue
body:
Lisa visits angel communicator Doreen Virtue in her home town of Maui, Hawaii. In this remarkable interview, Doreen reveals that the messages she has been experiencing from the Divine have been intensifying over the years. She explains how she believes this divine communication can help us in our lives.
 
Not only does Doreen Virtue have a Ph.D in psychology, she is also a lifelong clairvoyant and is one of Hay House’s most popular authors, with more than fifty books to her credit. She has appeared on Oprah, The View, CNN and many other programs talking about healing with your angels and has taught hundreds of thousands of people to communicate with their own angels.
teaser: Doreen Virtue reveals that the messages she has been experiencing from the Divine have been intensifying over the years.

title: The Pursuit of Immortality with Jason Sussberg and David Alvarado
body:
The Immortalists is a new movie about two eccentric scientists struggling to discover medical breakthroughs to create eternal youth. The film documents a fascinating community of scientists who look at the aging process as a disease. In this lively interview, the filmmakers Jason Sussberg and David Alvarado discuss how this film got made and why someone would want to live forever.

The Immortalists, now available on Gaia.

Jason Sussberg is an award-winning documentary filmmaker focused on BIG ideas on human progress and social justice.

David Alvarado is a cinematographer originally from Dallas, whose feature directorial debut, The Immortalists, was completed in 2014 and is now on the festival circuit.
teaser: The Immortalists is a new documentary about two eccentric scientists struggling to discover medical breakthroughs to create eternal youth.

title: 64 Powerful Principles for Success with Jack Canfield
body:
“Live big” is Jack Canfield’s motto. It’s what helped him stay inspired after 144 publishers turned him down for the Chicken Soup for the Soul Series. This was the driving force behind creating the franchise that to date has more than 500 million copies in print worldwide. In this inspiring interview, Jack discusses elements of his latest book, The Success Principles, which offers readers 64 powerful principles for success.

Known as “America’s #1 Success Coach,” Jack Canfield is a highly successful American author and an internationally recognized expert in personal development and achievement.  He is perhaps best known for co-creating the Chicken Soup for the Soul series, which has more than 250 titles and 500 million copies in print in more than 40 languages. He has written several other books as well, and is highly sought after for speaking engagements around the world.
teaser: “Live big” is Jack Canfield’s motto. It’s what helped him stay inspired after 144 publishers turned him down for the Chicken Soup for the Soul Series.

title: Natural Solutions to Parkinson’s and ADHD
body:
John Gray explains his findings concerning Parkinson’s disease, Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD), and Autism. What started as a search to better understand his diagnosis of Parkinson’s, turned into an in-depth exploration of the cause and ways to relieve the symptoms of ADHD. John believes that pharmacological solutions are just one of many tools for dealing with neurological disorders. He discusses various techniques ranging from complementary therapies like meditation and introspection to brain performance supplements. These alternative forms of healthcare often come with little to no side effects and can help improve quality of life. Discover different ways to protect mental health and promote a healthy functioning of the body and mind.
John Gray is the author of 25 best-selling books, including Men are from Mars, Women are from Venus, the #1 best-selling book of the last decade, and the #1 relationship book of all time, with more than 50 million copies sold in 50 different languages.
Video Disclaimer: The information contained in the multimedia content posted represents the views and opinions of the original creators of such Video Content and does not necessarily represent the views or opinions of Gaia. 

John Gray is the author of 25 best-selling books, including Men are from Mars, Women are from Venus, the #1 best-selling book of the last decade and the #1 relationship book of all time with more than 50 million copies sold in 50 different languages.
teaser: John Gray explains his findings concerning Parkinson’s disease, ADHD and Autism. What started out as a search to better understand his own diagnosis of Parkinson’s, turned into an in-depth exploration of the cause and ways to relieve the symptoms of ADHD.

title: Walking the Camino de Santiago with Sonia Choquette
body:
When life completely changes and everything you know gets uprooted, what do you do? Intuition expert and best-selling author Sonia Choquette went on a walk – a long walk.  When Sonia’s brother and father died and a long marriage ended, she packed up and walked the Camino de Santiago, a spiritual pilgrimage spanning 500 miles over the Pyrenees mountains of Northern Spain.  In this enlightening interview, Sonia talks about her journey . . . home.

Sonia Choquette is the author of 19 international bestselling books on intuitive awakening, personal growth, creativity, and transformational leadership, including her latest book titled, Tune In. Sonia insists that we must activate and rely on our innate sixth sense in order to make the most authentic, well-informed, healthy, and soul-satisfying decisions possible.
teaser: When life completely changes and everything you know gets uprooted, what do you do? Intuition expert and best-selling author Sonia Choquette went on a walk – a long walk.

title: Soul Shifts with Barbara De Angelis
body:
Now is the time to wake up to the true meaning of life. In her latest book, Soul Shifts, Barbara De Angelis advocates a practical spirituality, with the aim of connecting with your highest self on a day-to-day basis, rather than only on special occasions, such as being on retreat.  In this inspiring interview, Barbara De Angelis describes methods of shifting your focus to your soul level – your highest expression of yourself – and the impact those shifts can have on your state of being.

Barbara De Angelis is one of the most influential teachers of our time in the field of personal development, and for 25 years she has reached tens of millions of people throughout the world. She has 14 best-selling books to her credit, having sold more than ten million copies.
teaser: Now is the time to wake up to the true meaning of life. In her latest book, Soul Shifts, Barbara De Angelis advocates a practical spirituality, with the aim of connecting with your highest self on a day-to-day basis.

title: Notes from the Universe with Mike Dooley
body:
When asked how he manages to write his wildly popular e-mail newsletter, Notes from the Universe, Mike Dooley explains that all manifestations come about when you have an end result in mind, and you act on it. Whatever it is you want – life transformation, abundance, pain-free living – imagine that it’s already happened. You may have to take baby steps at first, but when you take action, it breeds clarity. And your words matter. In this empowering interview, Mike Dooley insists that your dreams really can come true.

Mike Dooley is a former PriceWaterhouseCoopers international tax consultant turned entrepreneur. He’s the founder of a philosophical Adventurers Club on the Internet that’s now home to 700,000 members from 182 countries. His inspirational books emphasizing spiritual accountability have been published in 25 languages, and he was one of the featured teachers in the international phenomenon The Secret. Today Mike is best known for his free, Notes from the Universe, e-mailings and his New York Times bestsellers Infinite Possibilities: The Art of Living Your Dreams and Leveraging the Universe: 7 Steps to Engaging Life’s Magic. Mike lives what he teaches, traveling internationally to speak on life, dreams, and happiness.
teaser: When asked how he manages to write his wildly popular e-mail newsletter, Notes from the Universe, Mike Dooley explains that all manifestations come about when you have an end result in mind, and you act on it.

title: The Field of Infinite Potentiality with Pam Grout
body:
There are many rules we go by in life, but where do they come from? In two of her recent books, best-selling author Pam Grout has codified some of those rules. Each book contains nine do-it-yourself energy experiments that prove your thoughts create your own reality and prove that manifesting magic and miracles is your full-time gig. Join Pam for this entertaining interview, as she explains her belief that the world is abundant and unlimited.

Pam Grout is the author of 17 books, which have been translated into 34 languages, along with numerous articles published in a wide variety of publications. She has also created three plays, a TV series and a couple of iPhone apps.
teaser: There are many rules we go by in life, but where do they come from? In two of her recent books, best-selling author Pam Grout has codified some of those rules.

title: Beyond Past Lives with Mira Kelley
body:
What if our psyches knew everything we needed to know – our past and our future? And what if the deepest answers to our most important questions are locked inside of our psyches? Wouldn’t you want to find out how to get them? In this remarkable interview, Mira Kelley relates her own experiences with past life regression, and she describes how she teaches people to learn about where they’re going by looking at their past.

Mira Kelley grew up in Bulgaria, where at the age of 13 she had a powerful regression experience. Following her graduation from law school, Mira practiced as a corporate and securities attorney in a large law firm in New York City. A painful physical condition led Mira to rediscover the instantaneous emotional and physical healing available through regression, and now she assists people in transforming their own lives in this way. She is the author of Beyond Past Lives.
teaser: What if our psyches knew everything we needed to know – our past and our future? And what if the deepest answers to our most important questions are locked inside of our psyches? Wouldn’t you want to find out how to get them?

title: One Spirit Medicine with Alberto Villoldo – Part 1
body:
Would you like to find out how our ancestors lived 50,000 years ago, before there were processed foods and Type 2 Diabetes?  What accounted for their well-being? In this illuminating interview, researcher and medical anthropologist Dr. Alberto Villoldo talks about one spirit medicine. Based on an extreme health crisis, Dr. Villoldo discovered that these ancient shamanic healing methods that go back to our Paleolithic ancestors are what helped him heal.

Alberto Villoldo, Ph.D., a psychologist and medical anthropologist, has studied the healing practices of the Amazon and Inka shamans for more than 25 years. While at San Francisco State University, he founded the Biological Self-Regulation Laboratory to study how the mind creates psychosomatic health and disease. Dr. Villoldo directs The Four Winds Society, where he trains individuals in the U.S. and Europe in the practice of energy medicine and soul retrieval. He is the author of numerous best-selling books, including Shaman, Healer, Sage.
teaser: The message of One Spirit Medicine is that you don’t need to track down a shaman to find spirit, or look outside yourself to find health. You only have to look within.

title: One Spirit Medicine with Alberto Villoldo – Part 2
body:
Shamanic healer Alberto Villoldo and Lisa Garr continue their detailed conversation about shamanic medicine.  Our bodies come programmed for the longevity of the species, rather than the individual. For this reason, once we pass our peak reproductive years, our body’s systems no longer operate or regenerate as well as they did. In this enlightening interview, Alberto Villoldo reveals that Shamans discovered how to switch the systems on again.  He discusses some of the ways to re-program the longevity of the individual through the luminous body.

Alberto Villoldo, Ph.D., a psychologist and medical anthropologist, has studied the healing practices of the Amazon and Inka shamans for more than 25 years. While at San Francisco State University, he founded the Biological Self-Regulation Laboratory to study how the mind creates psychosomatic health and disease. Dr. Villoldo directs The Four Winds Society, where he trains individuals in the U.S. and Europe in the practice of energy medicine and soul retrieval. He is the author of numerous best-selling books, including Shaman, Healer, Sage.
teaser: Shamanic healer Alberto Villoldo and Lisa Garr continue their detailed conversation about shamanic medicine, discussing ways to re-program the longevity of the individual through the luminous body.

title: Stay Inspired: A Year of Miracles with Marianne Williamson
body:
Marianne Williamson explores the meaning of “I am,” especially through her long practice with A Course in Miracles.  She contrasts the pressures of society, which lead us away from our true nature, with our connection with spirit, where we find our actual self. In this lively interview with Lisa Garr, she also points out that many of us today are working to bring down light to the world, stressing the importance for all of us to understand that we are all ministers who bring blessings by our doing. “I am love,” she states, adding, “If I’m acting in any other way I’m not being who I truly am.”

Marianne Williamson is an internationally acclaimed spiritual author and lecturer. Marianne has been a popular guest on television programs such as Oprah, Larry King Live, Good Morning America, Charlie Rose & Bill Maher. Six of her eleven published books have been New York Times Best Sellers. Four of these have been #1. The mega best seller A Return to Love is considered a must-read of The New Spirituality. A paragraph from that book, beginning “Our deepest fear is not that we are inadequate. Our deepest fear is that we are powerful beyond measure…” is considered an anthem for a contemporary generation of seekers.
teaser: Marianne Williamson explores the meaning of “I am.” She contrasts the pressures of society, which lead us away from our true nature, with our connection with spirit, where we find our actual self.

title: Stay Inspired: Conscious Evolution with Barbara Marx Hubbard
body:
For Barbara Marx Hubbard, the meaning of “I am” comes from the source of creation, and it is an impulse that for billions of years has been creating quarks, electron, protons, animals, and now humans. I am the universe in person, she adds, so the “I am” principle in every one of us is actually our unique experience of the creative impulse of the universe. In this far-seeing and hopeful interview with Lisa Garr, Barbara explains the importance of people who are already loving coming together to create a field of attraction and a vision of the future to overcome the negativity of old ways to generate a transformative evolutionary consciousness.

Barbara Marx Hubbard is a visionary and a social innovator. She thinks from an evolutionary perspective and believes that global change happens when we work collectively and selflessly for the greater good, and many would agree she is the global ambassador for conscious change. Deepak Chopra has called her “the voice for conscious evolution.”  A prolific author and educator, she has written seven books on social and planetary evolution and she has produced, hosted and contributed to countless documentaries seen by millions of people around the world.
teaser: For Barbara Marx Hubbard, the meaning of “I am” comes from the source of creation, and it is an impulse that for billions of years has been creating quarks, electron, protons, animals, and now humans.

title: Stay Inspired: Belief, Time and Reality with Jean Houston
body:
For Jean Houston, “I Am” is the ultimate Western mantra – a core memory that is both sound and purpose. Even as we are in the universe, the universe is in us. And once we realize that we are the universe, we have access to many of its powers and capacities.  In a fascinating example, in this provocative interview, she describes some modest experiments she’s tried in shifting the past, to edit, in a sense, the quantum field. This becomes possible, she explains, because in quantum physics, time past, present and future are simultaneous, and also, most essentially, because belief structures time and reality.

Jean Houston, Ph.D., scholar, philosopher and researcher in Human Capacities, is one of the foremost visionary thinkers and doers of our time.  She is long regarded as one of the principal founders of the Human Potential Movement. Dr. Houston is noted for her ability to combine a deep knowledge of history, culture, new science, spirituality and human development into her teaching. A prolific writer, she is the author of more than 30 books.  She has traveled the world over, meeting and advising many heads of state and other leaders. A powerful and dynamic speaker, she holds conference and seminars with social leaders, education institutions and business organizations around the globe.
teaser: For Jean Houston, “I Am” is the ultimate Western mantra – a core memory that is both sound and purpose. Even as we are in the universe, the universe is in us.

title: Stay Inspired: Activate Your Full Human Potential with Dr. Sue Morter
body:
Sue Morter practices bioenergetic medicine, which redirects the flow of high-frequency energy patterns in the body to activate our full human potential. In this insightful interview, Dr. Sue comments on the “I Am” theme to note that I Am brings us into pure presence, and our truth is residing very deep at the core of our being. When we connect with this energy, she says, “I am who I am regardless of what’s happening in this external environment.” She offers some exercises to help us keep connected with our own true energy, helping us to diffuse any discordant energy that is coming at us.

Sue Morter, DC, is an international speaker, master of bioenergetic medicine, and quantum field visionary. In addition to her private practice, Morter HealthCenter, she is founder of the Morter Institute for Bioenergetics, an organization committed to teaching individuals self-healing techniques. Through her seminars, retreats, excursions, and presentations, she illuminates the relationships of quantum thoughts and energy medicine, and the elevation of human consciousness and life mastery. She is nationally published and has served on professional licensing boards, providing guidance to health care practitioners on integrative approaches to health care leadership.
teaser: Sue Morter practices bioenergetic medicine, which redirects the flow of high-frequency energy patterns in the body to activate our full human potential.  When we connect with this energy, she says, “I am who I am regardless of what’s happening in this external environment.”

title: Stay Inspired: The Ultimate Truth Is Oneness with Joe Dispenza
body:
The functions of our brain and body chemistry can work to our benefit or detriment, depending on where we place our attention. If we rest our attention in our heart – biologically, the center of oneness – and cultivate an elevated emotion, such as gratitude or joy or love of life, and feel it deeply, we can expand our energy field to the degree we can feel connected to the greater unified field. In this eye-opening interview, Dr Joe Dispenza explains that when you are in that state, there are 1,300 chemicals that are released that stimulate your immune system, that cause regeneration and repair in the body, and lengthen telomeres as well.

Neuroscientist, chiropractor and author Dr Joe Dispenza empowers people to change from the inside out. Featured in the award-winning film What the Bleep Do We Know!?, Dr Dispenza combines the fields of quantum physics, neuroscience, brain chemistry, biology and genetics to teach you how to rewire your brain for health and happiness. He has lectured in more than 24 different countries on six continents, educating people about the functions of the human brain. He has taught thousands how to reprogram their thinking through scientifically proven neurophysiological principles.
teaser: The functions of our brain and body chemistry can work to our benefit or detriment, depending on where we place our attention. If we rest our attention in our heart – biologically, the center of oneness – and cultivate an elevated emotion, we can expand our energy field.

title: Stay Inspired: Mind, Body and Biology with Joan Borysenko
body:
Taking her expertise in the mind/body connection several steps further, Joan Borysenko explains the new research in interpersonal neurobiology, where, for example, our minds also affect those around us, and in epigenetics, where events in our lives – and even in our ancestor’s lives – can cause changes in our genetic make-up.  In this enlightening interview, Joan also discusses the results of her scientific investigation into a healthy diet, in which she discovered that humans’ dietary needs vary enough that no one diet works for everyone.  However, she also discovered the importance of a plant-based diet to feed the microbes in our body, which science now understands outnumber our own cells.

Joan Borysenko, Ph.D., is a distinguished pioneer in integrative medicine and a world-renowned expert in the mind/body connection. She is a Harvard-trained medical scientist, licensed psychologist and New York Times best-selling author, with more than a dozen books to her credit. Her work has been foundational in an international healthcare revolution that recognizes the role of meaning and the spiritual dimensions of life as an integral part of health and healing.
teaser: Taking her expertise in the mind/body connection several steps further, Joan Borysenko explains the new research in interpersonal neurobiology, where, for example, our minds also affect those around us, and in epigenetics, where events in our lives – and even in our ancestor’s lives – can cause changes in our genetic make-up.

title: Stay Inspired: Kindling the Native Spirit with Denise Linn
body:
When it comes to healing, Denise Linn often looks to the past.  From ancient traditions around the world she looks to acquire and perpetuate the valuable knowledge that must be passed down before it is lost.  At the same time, there are ancestral patterns that hold us back and need to be released. In this heartfelt interview, Denise Linn describes how trauma can affect a person’s genes, and how these changes in genetics can be passed down through generations.

Founder of the International Institute of Soul Coaching, Denise Linn is a healer, teacher and author known for drawing on wisdom from indigenous cultures around the planet, including the aborigines of Australia, the Zulu in Africa, the Maori of New Zealand and her own Native American roots.
teaser: When it comes to healing, Denise Linn often looks to the past.  From ancient traditions around the world she looks to acquire and perpetuate the valuable knowledge that must be passed down before it is lost. At the same time, there are ancestral patterns that hold us back and need to be released.

title: Stay Inspired: Indie Spirit and Recovery with Chris Grosso
body:
Every time Chris Grosso believed he had fallen about as far as he could fall, the bottom dropped out from under him and his life crashed lower. His role in the indie music scene gave him too much contact with the drug and alcohol addictions that were destroying his life.  Finally, as he reveals in this powerful interview, he connected with spirituality and found an inner serenity that allowed him to find a path away from substance abuse. Now, he helps others.

Chris Grosso is a public speaker, writer, recovering addict, spiritual director, and author of Indie Spiritualist: A No Bullshit Exploration of Spirituality and Everything Mind: What I've Learned About Hard Knocks, Spiritual Awakening and the Mind-Blowing Truth of it All. He writes for ORIGIN Magazine, Huffington Post, and Mantra Yoga + Health Magazine, and has spoken and performed at Wanderlust Festival, Yoga Journal Conference, Sedona World Wisdom Days, Kripalu, and more. A self-taught musician, Chris has been writing, recording, and touring since the mid-90s. He is passionate about his work with people who are in the process of healing or struggling with addictions of all kinds. He speaks and leads groups in detoxes, yoga studios, rehabs, youth centers, 12-step meetings, hospitals, conferences, and festivals worldwide. He is a member of the advisory board for Drugs over Dinner.
teaser: Every time Chris Grosso believed he had fallen about as far as he could fall, the bottom dropped out from under him and his life crashed lower. Then he connected with spirituality and found an inner serenity that allowed him to find a path away from substance abuse. Now, he helps others.

title: Stay Inspired: Oracles and Intuition with Colette Baron-Reid
body:
What happens when you're creating a brand new project and you're scared? That's a question Lisa Garr, who is contemplating a new venture, asks Colette Baron-Reid in this insightful interview.  Colette responds that fear and stress contract the mind and do not allow the “I Am” to be operating in your favor.  That's when you would go to the oracle, because the oracle can reflect to you what you cannot see -- because when you're in a contracted state you are unable to access your intuition. Watch, as Colette coaches Lisa through selecting Oracle cards and then commenting on their meaning.

Colette Baron-Reid is an internationally renowned intuitive counselor, educator and best-selling author who helps others recognize and connect with their own intuition, potential and purpose. She is also a powerful motivational speaker, charismatic broadcast personality and acclaimed performer, storyteller and recording artist.
teaser: Fear and stress contract the mind and do not allow the “I Am” to be operating in your favor.  That's when you would go to the oracle, because the oracle can reflect to you what you cannot see when your contracted state prevents you from accessing your intuition.

title: Stay Inspired: Your Story Is Immortal with don Miguel Ruiz
body:
We are each of us artists creating our own story with our life, according to don Miguel Ruiz.  He adds that our story does not die when our body dies; rather, our story is immortal.  After suffering a heart attack that left him in a 2-month coma some years back, don Miguel had time to ponder what it would mean for him to die.  In this illuminating interview, he shares his observations on life and death.

Don Miguel Ruiz is a Mexican author who shares the wisdom of the ancient Toltec through his books, lectures and journeys to sacred sites around the world. His most famous and influential work, The Four Agreements, has sold some 4 million copies. It advocates personal freedom from agreements and beliefs that we have made with ourselves and others that are creating limitation and unhappiness in our lives.
teaser: We are each of us artists creating our own story with our life, according to don Miguel Ruiz.  He adds that our story does not die when our body dies; rather, our story is immortal.

title: Stay Inspired: Loving Our Imperfections with Arielle Ford
body:
Arielle Ford, a student of love, discusses the art of finding perfect love in imperfect relationships. In this insightful interview,  Arielle and Lisa explore the nature of a soulmate, noting that one’s soulmate is also one’s teacher, and not every moment will be harmonious. The secret lies in finding the deeper harmony even in challenging times.

Arielle Ford is a leading personality in the personal growth and contemporary spirituality movement. For the past 25 years she has been living, teaching, and promoting consciousness through all forms of media. Her stellar career includes years as a prominent book publicist, author, literary agent, TV lifestyle reporter, television producer, radio host, publishing consultant, relationship expert, speaker, columnist and blogger for the Huffington Post.
teaser: Arielle Ford, a student of love, discusses the art of finding perfect love in imperfect relationships. In this insightful interview, Arielle and Lisa explore the nature of a soulmate and look at some of the myths surrounding that concept.

title: Stay Inspired: Harmonizing Your Heart and Brain with Gregg Braden
body:
When scientific investigation revealed sensory neurites (brain-like cells) in the heart, it confirmed an expanded understanding of the heart’s role, beyond pumping blood, and aligns with what ancient spiritual traditions have maintained all along.  In this revealing interview, Gregg Braden explains that you can tune your heart to work together in harmony with your brain. When you do, he adds, some 1,400 biochemical reactions occur, with, for example, powerful effects on your immune response, along with a great many other benefits.

Gregg Braden is a New York Times best-selling author whose pioneering work bridges science and spirituality. He has explored high mountain villages, remote monasteries, and forgotten texts in order to merge their timeless secrets with the best science of today. His latest book, Resilience from the Heart: The Power to Thrive in Life’s Extremes (a revision of his book The Turning Point), calls us to recognize that every crisis can become a moment of transformation.
teaser: You can tune your heart to work together in harmony with your brain. When you do, some 1,400 biochemical reactions occur, providing a great many benefits.

title: An Inspired Life with Regina Meredith
body: What if your life’s purpose came to you on a dare? In revealing the events and inspirations in her life — including the dare that started her career in television — Regina Meredith points the way for anyone to lead an inspiring life. She suggests that what may seem “accidental” at the time may really be a manifestation of guidance on life’s true path.  From her childhood and her early days in television sports to her work in conscious media and her deep commitment to esoteric studies, Regina tells her story and blazes a path for all to follow.
teaser: Regina Meredith reveals the events and inspirations in her life that have led to her work in conscious media, and she shows the way to discovering your life’s purpose.

title: Proof of a Mindful Universe with Eben Alexander
body: What is consciousness? Does it arise from the brain? Does it die when we do?  Or is it something beyond, that continues after the body’s demise?  This essential question occupied Eben Alexander, who spent 54 years honing a scientific worldview as a neurosurgeon until a near-death experience took him on a profound spiritual journey into ultra-real realms, far more real than this one. Today, working to bridge the gap between science and spirituality, he is convinced that following the scientific evidence reveals that when you die it’s not the end of your existence and reincarnation is absolutely real. Explore what it means to live your life when you know that consciousness never dies.
teaser: Eben Alexander, bridging the gap between science and spirituality, explores what it means to live your life when you know that consciousness never dies.

title: Love in Action with Matt Kahn
body: We can learn to use pain as a teacher. In short, everything we experience becomes part of our evolution. Growing up as an empath, Matt Kahn found that any time someone treated him in a hostile way, he would naturally see the person’s pain that generated the attack, and so he found himself responding with compassion instead of aggression. In time, he realized that love is always the answer.  He invites us to recognize that the most difficult things that ever happen to us are meant to be the greatest opportunities we’re given to grow and evolve.
teaser: Is it possible that the most difficult things that ever happened to us were the greatest opportunities we’ve been given to grow and evolve?

title: From Creation to the Universal Human with Barbara Marx Hubbard
body: Taking an evolutionary perspective on the 13.7 billion years since the big bang, Barbara Marx Hubbard, a true American visionary, explores our path to creating a better culture of love, of creativity, and of wholeness, on the way to creating a new species in ourselves — the universal human.  Conscious evolution is possible, she insists, and, as crisis precedes transformation, we must band together — awakening the power of our social potential to overcome the forces of devolution.
teaser: A new human is emerging everywhere, insists the eternally-hopeful Barbara Marx Hubbard, a true American visionary.

title: Spiritual Healing Through Past Life Exploration with Linda Backman
body: Can past life regression heal your present life? Does your soul evolve from one life to the next? Linda Backman specializes in past life regression, which she calls spiritual regression, and, as she’s discovered with her clients, not every lifetime has necessarily been on Earth. She has no doubt that the soul reincarnates, and that the incarnations are designed for our spiritual advancement. Regression is like a key in the lock to demystify — and take the fear out of — what is going on in this lifetime. It is up to us to recognize the lesson and embrace it.
teaser: Have you had a life on Earth or anywhere else before? Linda Backman, who specializes in past life regression, tells you how to bring your soul to light.

title: You Can't Google Wisdom with Anita Sanchez
body: We are never alone.  We are always connected.  Anita Sanchez, best-selling author, consultant, trainer, and executive coach, brings the traditional wisdom of her Native American ancestry to the modern world to show us how to live and work together. Put the smartphone down and reconnect — with yourself first, and then with nature and other “two-leggeds.” To be connected we need to engage each other. To that end, she introduces Four Elements and Four Gifts, all with simple, practical exercises to  help you connect with the oneness of everything.
teaser: Anita Sanchez introduces Four Elements and Four Gifts, all with simple, practical exercises to  help you connect with the oneness of everything.

title: Power and Spirit of Community with Mark Nepo
body:
Discover the power and spirit of community both in our lives and in the world. Mark Nepo, poet, philosopher, and spiritual advisor, spent twelve years gathering stories and lessons of community from across cultures and history as research for his latest book exploring the universality of community. Just as humans can grow from facing challenges, communities come together in disaster. Because we are wired to care about each other for our wellbeing, community builds coherence. Mark concludes with the overall theme he discovered: that time and again, when fear makes a group of people think that self-interest will protect them, love and suffering affirm that we’re more together than alone. 

Bestselling author Mark Nepo has published fifteen books, including his number one New York Times bestseller, The Book of Awakening. His recent work includes, The Endless Practice, his latest book of poems, Reduced to Joy, and Inside the Miracle. Mark devotes his writing and teaching to the journey of inner transformation and the life of relationship. He continues to offer readings, lectures, and retreats all over the world.
teaser: We are more together than alone. And because we are wired to care about each other for our wellbeing, community builds coherence.

title: Good Health Drives Empowerment with Ben Fuchs
body: Make yourself stronger; make yourself better; make yourself more powerful. For pharmacist and nutritionist Ben Fuchs, there is one theme: empowerment. And good health is necessary for empowerment. Fuchs offers a wealth of easy-to-follow, understandable suggestions, including six common-sense steps to better health. Disease is the body trying to defend itself; so the question always is: what is your body trying to protect yourself from? Conventional medicine often treats the symptoms as if they were the disease, without getting to what is causing the problem.  Learn to listen to your body and stop marginalizing your magnificence.
teaser: Ben Fuchs offers a wealth of easy-to-follow, easy-to-understand keys to better health, including six common-sense steps for a stronger you.

title: Backyard Foraging with Brigitte Mars
body: Helpful remedies are at our fingertips!  We would never be hungry if we knew what was abounding right in our own backyards. Brigitte Mars, an internationally renowned expert on foraging and the medicinal and nutritional properties of plants, laments that the average American recognizes more than a thousand logos and their associated products, but fewer than five plants or five birds. Supplementing the fascinating conversation about health and sustainability, Brigitte further demonstrates her encyclopedic knowledge by touring the grounds at Gaia’s headquarters, explaining the uses of plants found growing wild.
teaser: Helpful remedies are at our fingertips!  We would never be hungry if we knew what was abounding right in our own backyards.

title: The Science of Heart Intelligence with Howard Martin
body:
The heart is doing more than pumping blood, says Howard Martin of HeartMath. The physical heart is an information processing center in our bodies. There exists a complex nerve system in the heart, which communicates directly to the brain. Research shows that brain function is critically dependent on the information from the heart, and their alignment leads to states of personal, interpersonal, and global coherence. Martin brings us up-to-date on the remarkable research HeartMath is doing in this arena. The spirit of humanity is rising to the occasion, he says, and we are ushering in a new and very different world right in the midst of the old one.

Howard Martin is one of the original leaders who helped Doc Childre found HeartMath. He is coauthor of The HeartMath Solution and author of The HeartMath Method.
teaser: The spirit of humanity is rising to the occasion and we are ushering in a new and very different world right in the midst of the old one.

title: The Way of the Warrior Goddess with HeatherAsh Amara
body:
We have to get comfortable with being uncomfortable, says HeatherAsh Amara, author of Warrior Goddess Training and Awaken Your Inner Fire. We must learn to advocate for ourselves, rather than constantly comparing ourselves to who we think we’re supposed to be — and finding ourselves coming up short. The warrior goddess blends two important energies — the warrior, which is about total focus, clarity, and commitment, and the goddess, which is about opening, bigness, creativity, receptivity, and joy. Each woman can find her own unique blend. It can be messy at times, but we must let go of the old shells of who we’ve been so we can find out who we are.

HeatherAsh Amara has studied and taught extensively with don Miguel Ruiz and continues to teach with the Ruiz family. She brings an openhearted, inclusive worldview to her writings and teachings, which are a rich blend of Toltec wisdom, European shamanism, Buddhism, and Native American ceremony.
teaser: We must let go of the old shells of who we’ve been so we can find out who we are.

title: The MindBody Self with Mario Martinez
body: Clinical neuropsychologist Mario Martinez brings together insights from medicine, psychology, anthropology and spirituality to create biocognitive science. He insists that mind and body are inseparable from culture; that culture determines how we see ourselves in the world and so has a direct effect on our health. He has a special interest in centenarians and explains that genetics is only about twenty percent of their longevity, but that how they live is the major factor. Martinez advises asking yourself, “What can I do today to believe that I’m a good person?” Give yourself permission to be yourself.
teaser: Clinical neuropsychologist Mario Martinez brings together insights from medicine, psychology, anthropology and spirituality to create biocognitive science. He maintains that mind and body are inseparable from culture.

title: Living Through Addiction and Recovery with Chris Grosso
body:
Twenty million American adults and children struggle with substance abuse. Chris Grosso has struggled with addiction for years, bringing a spiritual approach to his efforts. He strives to aid others, and he can be an inspiration to anyone struggling with addiction or a source of wisdom and compassion for anyone who wants to understand those strugglers. Yet, as he explains here in painful detail, he suffered a scary relapse since he last appeared on Inspirations. He talks about the challenges all addicts face, and the strategies that can help support recovery.

Chris Grosso is a public speaker, writer, recovering addict, spiritual director, and author of Indie Spiritualist: A No Bullshit Exploration of Spirituality and Everything Mind: What I've Learned About Hard Knocks, Spiritual Awakening and the Mind-Blowing Truth of it All. He writes for ORIGIN Magazine, Huffington Post, and Mantra Yoga + Health Magazine, and has spoken and performed at Wanderlust Festival, Yoga Journal Conference, Sedona World Wisdom Days, Kripalu, and more.
teaser: Twenty million American adults and children struggle with substance abuse. Chris Grosso has struggled with addiction for years, bringing a spiritual approach to his efforts.

title: Communicating with Spirits of History with Sonja Grace
body:
Sonja Grace travels  to extraordinary places and experiences what happened there and communes with spirits that reside there. She travels both by spirit and in person. Sonja considers herself an energy surgeon whose spirit travels to work with people doing energy clearing and long-distance healings. By addressing the past-life emotional wounds and seeing how they reflect karmically, we heal in this lifetime and the past. She insists we’re here to love at the deepest level of our being — and love will supercede everything, even in the darkest moments. Love is what keeps us evolving.

Sonja Grace has been offering her clients immediate stability, clarity, and guidance for over thirty years. Her ability to read and clear the karmic threads to past lives helps clients heal lifetimes of patterns. Sonja is also an energy surgeon and helps clients to identify where the discomfort is in the physical, emotional, mental or spiritual bodies. Spirit Traveler takes a step further into time travel and her discoveries of the ancient past.
teaser: Sonja Grace travels  to extraordinary places and experiences what happened there and communes with spirits that reside there.

title: Philosophy and the Afterlife with Raymond Moody
body: Do we go anywhere after we die? Raymond Moody, who coined the term “Near Death Experience,” is probably closer to that question than anyone on Earth. Beginning with the publication of his bestselling book, Life After Life, in 1975, he has interviewed innumerable people who appear to have crossed over to the other side and come back to tell about it. But for himself, Moody, who has always been driven by curiosity, remains unsure. His first loves are philosophy and logic, and he brings a philosopher’s approach to the contrast between “belief” and “what is” in this fascinating conversation with a fascinating man.
teaser: Do we go anywhere after we die? Raymond Moody, who coined the term “Near Death Experience,” is probably closer to that question than anyone on Earth.

title: Astrology Zone for 2019 with Susan Miller
body: Mercury in retrograde? Jupiter in Sagittarius? New moon? Full moon? Eclipse? What does it all mean, and when is it happening?  Astrologer Susan Miller, creator of the phenomenally popular Astrology Zone, talks about the workings of astrology, her roots in it, and she also offers a preview of the year ahead, including a sign-by-sign rundown of what opportunities can arise. Essential viewing for anyone who wants to better understand this cosmic science.
teaser: Mercury in retrograde? Jupiter in Sagittarius? New moon? Full moon? Eclipse? What does it all mean, and when is it happening?

title: Chi for Life with Effie Chow
body: Chi is your connection with the universe; your connection with the life force and your resource for bringing  emotional, spiritual, and physical balance into your life.  Qigong grandmaster Dr. Effie Chow, with a career that spans more than 45 years, has been a pioneer in integrating alternative and traditional Chinese medicine with Western medicine in clinical practice and policy implementation. She has dedicated herself to spreading the healing message of qigong around the world, including its role in stopping cancer.
teaser: Chi is your connection with the universe; your connection with the life force and a source for healing.

title: Transform Your Personality, Transform Your Life with Dr Joe Dispenza
body: How can you learn to break your addiction to a life you don’t even like?  If you transform your personality, you can transform your life, and that transformation can lead to a life that is nothing short of miraculous.   Author and neuroscientist Dr Joe Dispenza reveals how we get trapped in our habitual emotional responses, so much so that by the time we’re 35 years old we’re a set of memorized programs. In clear language, based on his years of scientific research, he explains that your personality is made up of how you think, how you act and how you feel. If you change those elements you can change your personality. Wouldn’t you rather fall in love with your future?
teaser: If you transform your personality, you can transform your life, and that transformation can lead to a life that is nothing short of miraculous.

title: Liberated Living with Kute Blackson
body: Get ready to go on a bold journey with the dynamic rising transformation leader Kute Blackson, who offers a new paradigm of spirituality for a new generation. Are you waiting for someone else to solve your problems? Are you waiting for someone to save you? To make you feel happy? Blackson says no one is coming to save you or rescue you. It’s actually you — you are the one. Through telling his own compelling story, he shows that you cannot be happy living someone else’s version of your life. Step into your greatness. Start where you are, with who you are, with exactly what you have, and begin. There’s nothing to wait for — you are everything you’ve been looking for.
teaser: Step into your greatness!

title: Sensitive Is the New Strong with Anita Moorjani
body: Anita Moorjani wants sensitive people to know what they have is not a weakness, but a strength — and that the planet needs their contributions. She offers tools that allow intuitive beings to be strong in a fear-based world.  Some years after surviving her death from stage four cancer, she came to understand that she was a sensitive intuitive and that fear had been a source of her illness. Sensitives’ emotions are exaggerated in their own minds — they think everyone else knows better than they do and they give their power away to everybody. Anita learned to disengage from her problems, and she generously shares the methods she discovered.
teaser: Anita Moorjani wants sensitive people to know what they have is not a weakness, but a strength — and that the planet needs their contributions.

title: The Energy Codes with Dr. Sue Morter
body: Have you ever felt disconnected or disassociated from your body? A master of bio-energetic medicine who is known for bringing science, spirit and human possibility together, Dr. Sue Morter explains that the stagnant energy that’s trapped in your body could actually be the reason. As she reveals in her recent book The Energy Codes, you can learn how to move that energy consciously and intentionally, so it doesn’t stagnate. If that energy is flowing freely, then we are healthy, vital, clear, strong, and robust, and we can manifest and achieve the things that we want.
teaser: Clear stagnant energy to allow the flow of vitality, health, strength, and manifestation.

title: The Choice for Love with Barbara De Angelis
body:
Love is a choice. It’s how you connect to your higher self. According to renowned author and teacher Barbara De Angelis, love doesn’t come from outside; it arises within yourself. She presents a simple technique to apply during challenging moments. You can ask yourself:  What’s happening in me?  What am I choosing in this moment? Is there a more loving choice?  How can I bring more love to this situation? Love, she insists, is the way we all can change the world.

Barbara De Angelis is one of the most influential teachers of our time in the field of personal development, and for 25 years she has reached tens of millions of people throughout the world. She has 14 best-selling books to her credit, having sold more than ten million copies.
teaser: Barbara De Angelis reveals that love is a choice we can — and must — make over and over again.

title: Waking Up in 5D with Maureen St. Germain
body: What is it like to live in the fifth dimension? According to Maureen St. Germain it’s like heaven on earth — a vibrational place where we have a good connection with our divine creator, where we manifest perfection in our thoughts and minds. She describes how to make the transition from the polarized mindset of the third dimension to the joy and love of the fifth, where there is no polarity — no right or wrong or good or bad. Along the way, she offers a fascinating six-week exercise in learning how to connect with our higher self.
teaser: What is it like to live in the fifth dimension? According to Maureen St. Germain it’s like heaven on earth.

title: Adventures Beyond the Body with William Buhlman
body: Over the last 24 years, William Buhlman has guided hundred of people with his safe, self-initiated out-of-body adventures. Why would anyone want to do it?  We all want answers. We want to know if we are more than our bodies — if in fact we are spirits. He reveals how to turn an out-of-body experience into a life-changing one. And he offers a technique for using the experience to connect with your higher self. We are immortal, he says; there’s nothing to be afraid of.
teaser: Did you know you can safely have an out-of-the-body adventure without a traumatic accident or near-death experience?

title: Happy from the Inside Out with Marci Shimoff
body: Are you being run by unconscious behaviors that prevent you from feeling happy? That was Marci Shimoff’s problem until she dove deep into her study of happiness. Her best-selling book, Happy for No Reason, describes an inner state of peace and well-being that doesn’t depend on our circumstances, and she shares specific, simple techniques and exercises to help you get there. If you devote 5 to 10 minutes a day to these practices, there can be miraculous changes to your life.
teaser: Marci Shimoff, bestselling author of Happy for No Reason, shares specific, simple exercises and techniques that can change your life.

title: Thriving Through Uncertainty with Tama Kieves
body: Why do we react fearfully whenever change confronts us? Career success coach and bestselling author Tama Kieves reveals how to move through fear and make change work. In our ever-shifting economic and technological landscape it’s become crucial to learn the skills needed to adapt when change happens, whether it’s a sudden job loss, an unexpected accident, or a difficult break-up. Uncertainty, she insists, is your superpower — because the path to the life you desire is already inside you, but you won’t find it from a place of  control and status quo.
teaser: Uncertainty is your superpower. Tama Kieves shares how to move through fear, adapt to change, and find the life you desire.

title: Beyond Mars and Venus with John Gray
body: Two decades ago, John Gray revolutionized the way we thought about love and partnership. But over time, society evolves and relationships do, too. It’s time to move beyond Mars and Venus. In our increasingly complex world, developing more emotionally satisfying relationships requires a deeper understanding of our partners’ individual needs — and our own, for that matter. In Beyond Mars and Venus, Gray teaches you how to strengthen your bond and grow in love together, so you and your loved one can meet each other’s needs in the best way possible, bringing you lasting happiness and a fulfilling partnership.
teaser: Author John Gray explains how our relationship needs are evolving in today’s complex world and how maintaining hormonal balance can help us connect in the best way possible.

title: The Life of a Peaceful Warrior with Dan Millman
body: What is my purpose?  This is the question that started Dan Millman, former world champion gymnast and the author of the best-selling Way of the Peaceful Warrior, on a journey that has inspired millions. Now, 17 books later, he shares the wisdom of his four decades as a seeker, with advice on how to understand and navigate what he calls the four purposes of life. In his latest book, The Hidden School, he reveals that life — everyday life — is your hidden school, offering all the lessons you need if only you know how to look. He invites you to awaken to the hidden powers of paradox, humor, and change — and to discover a vision that may forever change your perspectives about life’s promise and potential.
teaser: Dan Millman is a former world champion gymnast and author of the best-selling Way of the Peaceful Warrior. Join us as he shares his journey through self-discovery, paradox, humor, and change.

title: Trauma and the Auto-Immune Puzzle with Dr. Keesha Ewers
body: In overcoming trauma, success only comes if you digest it well.  Healthy success is when you can enjoy your life with minimal stress. Dr. Keesha Ewers is passionate about getting to the root cause of any disease or imbalance.  A victim of abuse as a teenager, she later suffered from a debilitating auto-immune disease that she was only able to reverse by learning to digest the anger she’d kept locked away since her youth.  She has deeply explored the link between unresolved trauma and auto-immune disease and discovered several techniques for disarming that stress by facing hidden emotions.
teaser: Get to the root of trauma, stress, and illness with Dr. Keesha Ewers who shares several techniques for facing and releasing trapped emotions.

title: How Suffering Transforms Us with Rabbi Steve Leder
body: Suffering is the common denominator of being human; sooner or later, every one of us walks through hell. Rabbi Steve Leder’s hope is that no one has to walk through hell and come out empty handed. He speaks of how to find meaning in suffering and resolve to live a life worthy of the ordeal. Rabbi Leder, as senior rabbi of one of America’s largest synagogues, has counseled and held the hands of thousands of congregants suffering from illness, grief, family crises over the years — but it wasn’t until a terrible car accident put him through his own journey of pain and suffering that he became more available than ever before to listen to people’s stories about pain. His suffering made him a more enlightened, kinder, gentler, wiser, better human being (and he still wishes it hadn’t happened).
teaser: Find the transformative gifts within grief and suffering. Rabbi Steve Leder has counseled thousands of congregants through their loss and now shares what he’s learned from personal and collective suffering.

title: Sound Healing for Health and Happiness with Jonathan Goldman
body:
Do you know that music and sound have the ability to rearrange molecular structure? Jonathan Goldman, who has researched and experimented with sound over five decades, explains how sound healing uses frequencies for manifestation and transformation. In his latest book, The Humming Effect, he points out that everyone can use sound; you don’t have to be a trained musician.  Humming can increase oxygen, decrease cortisol, and increase nitric oxide; it can create and enhance melatonin, oxytocin, and endorphins. From tuning the chakras to experiencing the Earth’s resonance, from the sounds for prayer to, most astonishingly, the sound of the Divine Name that God revealed to Moses, we see why the use of sound as a healing tool dates back thousands of years.

Jonathan is a writer, musician and teacher as well as an authority on sound healing and a pioneer in the field of harmonics.  He has studied with masters of sound from both the scientific and spiritual traditions, including the Dalai Lama’s Chanting Gyuto and Gyume Monks and has been empowered by the Chant Master of the Drepung Loseling Monastery to teach Tibetan Overtone Chanting.
teaser: Increase oxygen and nitric oxide, decrease cortisol, and enhance the production of melatonin and endorphins when humming and using the healing frequencies of sound. Researcher Jonathan Goldman explains how. .

title: Quantum Physics in Everyday Life with Fred Alan Wolf
body: What does quantum physics mean to you? Physicist Fred Alan Wolf, known popularly as Dr. Quantum, has a unique ability to communicate the complex topic of quantum physics into more understandable terms and to explain how these principles can be applied in everyday life. The big thing quantum physics tells him is that we are creating reality through the way we are observing. So how are we to navigate life by these principles?  See his surprising answers.
teaser: Navigate life and create the reality you want by using the principles of quantum physics. Fred Alan Wolf, also known as Dr. Quantum, explains how your observations shape your life.

title: Five Levels of Manifestation with Pam Oslie
body:
We are far more powerful than we think. Imagine if you could manifest what you desire instantly. Pam Oslie — author, consultant, and psychic intuitive — not only insists it can be done, but she reveals how she’s been doing it. She has dramatic stories from experimenting with parallel universes, creating realities that don’t seem possible. She explains about the five levels of manifestation and how we can bring the things we desire in life closer to us with a daily practice. 

Pamala Oslie is an author, consultant, lecturer, and professional psychic with a very extensive clientele that includes many celebrities. Pamala has appeared on many television and radio shows to explain the emerging human potential, psychic abilities, auras, and the power of our beliefs to create our reality. She has written four successful and popular books: Life Colors, Love Colors, Infinite You and Make Your Dreams Come True, and has a very extensive clientele, including many celebrities. Pam is the Founder of the Auracolors website, a site designed to help you create love, joy and fulfillment in EVERY area of your life
teaser: Imagine being able to manifest your desires instantly. Author and psychic intuitive, Pam Oslie shares her personal experiences and her daily practice that utilizes the five levels of manifestation.

title: Connect with Your Life Now with Sam Horn
body: Do you know anyone who is putting off their dream? Could this person be you? One day you might wake up and discover there isn’t any time left to do the things you wanted to do. Sam Horn presents a call to action in her latest book, Someday Is Not a Day in the Week. She offers simple, straightforward, but highly effective tools for helping you come to grips with what you really want (and what you really don’t want) from your life, and how to realize it. Our whole goal is to connect with our lives — to connect with what will really matter in the long run. It’s time to get clear, stop waiting, and do something about it.
teaser: Connect with your life purpose and get clear about what really matters to you. Sam Horn offers simple, effective tools from her new book, Someday Is Not a Day in the Week, to help in prioritizing and achieving your dreams.

title: Conscious Uncoupling with Katherine Woodward Thomas
body: Fifty percent of marriages end in divorce.  And while no one wants to go through this, there is a way to consciously uncouple from a long-term relationship so all can live happily even after.  Bestselling author Katherine Woodward Thomas, in order to break the family pattern of a terrible divorce, established a way to end her marriage but keep her family intact for her child’s sake, and along the way discovered how liberating it was to eliminate any sense of anger and betrayal from the break up.
