Discover the valuable method beyond the tabloid headlines that made the concept famous. Conscious Uncoupling provides a blueprint of how we can complete our romantic unions in a way that leaves us happy, whole, and free.
teaser: Katherine Woodward Thomas reveals how to consciously uncouple from a long-term rlationship so all can live happily even after.

title: Death: An Inspiration for Living with Marilyn Schlitz
body: Death makes life possible.  So says author, professor, and life coach Marilyn Schlitz, who believes when we confront — or even befriend — our mortality, it imbues our life with a greater sense of purpose and kindness.  What can we do to relieve the anxiety of death? The key to the conquest of death is to find out who we are. She describes a five-step transformative process as a means to train our consciousness to be at peace. When we challenge the assumptions our culture holds about death we can empower ourselves to recognize our lives as meaningful and to live happier.
teaser: Death makes life possible. coach Marilyn Schlitz, who believes when we confront — or even befriend — our mortality, it imbues our life with a greater sense of purpose and kindness.  The key to the conquest of death is to find out who we are.

title: Guided to Your Divine Fire with Cyndi Dale
body:
We all need more energy. The type that leads to more love, success, health, prosperity, and peace of mind. Subtle energy can provide an endless flow of goodness. Cyndi Dale, author, intuitive, and healer, has used her psychic gifts for the last 25 years to see into different realities and to provide intuitive and energy healing for thousands of people. She insists that everybody is equipped with a divine light, a divine fire, that allows us to access our higher self. She advises us on the many ways we can adapt this energy, receive guidance, and connect to spirit.

Cyndi Dale, author of Awaken Clairvoyant Energy, has long been a natural intuitive with a passion to helping people open their essential energy. In addition to her natural intuitive gifts, she is trained in shamanism, intuitive healing, energy healing, family of origin therapy, therapeutic touch, the Lakota way and faith healing and holds a fourth degree mastership in Reiki.
teaser: Cyndi Dale insists that everybody is equipped with a divine light, a divine fire, that allows us to access our higher self. She advises us on the many ways we can adapt this energy, receive guidance, and connect to spirit.

title: Being You, Changing the World with Dain Heer
body: Dain Heer, author and co-creator of Access Consciousness, wants you to find and embrace the authentic you. We’ve become convinced, because of how we are taught, that we’re bad and wrong, and unhappiness arises from being constantly confined in that container of judgment.  What if you suddenly realized that you haven’t done anything wrong; you’ve actually done everything right?  It doesn’t matter what other people think; don’t make yourself wrong to satisfy others’ judgments. Dain insists that the only time we create difficulty in our lives is when we don’t function from consciousness, and he offers a slew of tools to help bring your awareness back to you.
teaser: Dain Heer, author and co-creator of Access Consciousness, wants you to find and embrace the authentic you. It doesn’t matter what other people think; don’t make yourself wrong to satisfy others’ judgments.

title: Natural Resonance Meditation with John Gray
body: Although he is best known as a relationship expert, in fact John Gray has been a meditator for 50 years. He studied sacred techniques with the Maharishi Mahesh Yogi, the guru who developed Transcendental Meditation. John was a celibate monk who lived with the Maharishi as his personal assistant for 9 years. Searching for a meditation technique that anyone can use, John developed natural resonance meditation, and here he gives us very specific instructions. Calling down divine energy, with the help of natural frequencies, such as found in water, fire, flowers, or music, John has devised a simple and beautiful mantra, or prayer, to ask for blessings for ourselves, our loved ones, and beyond.
teaser: Searching for a meditation technique that anyone can use, John developed natural resonance meditation, and here he gives us very specific instructions.

title: Listening to Your Guides with Sonia Choquette
body:
Your soul and your guides lead the way, if you listen. In the span of just six weeks, intuitive guide and spiritual teacher Sonia Choquette suffered a stunning series of losses — the deaths of her brother and father, and separation from her husband. She came to realize that our spiritual tools cannot keep trouble away, but she also discovered that they can help us deal with it. If you’re going through a really big change, this can be a time to reinvent yourself. Her guides sent her twice to walk Spain’s famed Camino de Santiago and then to move to Paris. She learned to let go, and to let her soul and her guides inform her. Ask your guides for help and they show up.

Sonia Choquette is the author of 19 international bestselling books on intuitive awakening, personal growth, creativity, and transformational leadership, including her latest book titled, Tune In. Sonia insists that we must activate and rely on our innate sixth sense in order to make the most authentic, well-informed, healthy, and soul-satisfying decisions possible.
teaser: Our spiritual tools cannot keep trouble away, but they can help us deal with it. If you’re going through a really big change, this can be a time to reinvent yourself. Ask your guides for help and they show up.

title: Claim Your Purpose with Mastin Kipp
body: “My moonshot is to end emotional trauma in my lifetime.” These are the ambitious words of author, motivational speaker, and functional life coach Mastin Kipp, who recognizes underlying emotional trauma as the leading obstacle to a fulfilling life. In his years of practice, he has found that purpose is one of the best tools to heal trauma, and he shares the ways he helps his clients find theirs. Clinical data reveals that a sense of purpose can add 10 to 15 years to your life, among many other health benefits. We are born to live meaningful and useful lives, and purpose is the centerpiece upon which you build success.
teaser: “My moonshot is to end emotional trauma in my lifetime.” These are the ambitious words of Mastin Kipp, who, in his years of practice, has found that purpose is one of the best tools to heal trauma.

title: Finding Purpose with Past Lives with Mira Kelley
body: Unlock the door of who you really are. The answers to your deepest questions are locked inside your own subconscious mind.  Past-life regression expert Mira Kelley reveals how to get access to that locked up information so you can heal. She reveals how your fears, phobias, anxieties, and other emotional states have their origins in past-life events. She explains that your psyche not only knows your past, but also where you’re going in your future. Past-life regression can help you find your soul’s purpose, which is your always ongoing path of growth and development.
teaser: Unlock the door of who you really are. The answers to your deepest questions are locked inside your own subconscious mind.  Past-life regression expert Mira Kelley reveals how to get access to that locked up information so you can heal.

title: The Three Questions with don Miguel Ruiz
body: Everything we do is based on the agreements that we have made — agreements often imposed on us by our parents, our schools, or our society, which turn us into people-pleasing machines. Don Miguel Ruiz wrote The Four Agreements as a challenge to society’s rules of domestication. His deeply influential book spent nearly a decade on the New York Times bestseller list and sold some seven million copies. In his latest book, he offers three essential questions we can ask ourselves in concert with our work on the agreements. Together, they offer powerful tools that can rapidly transform our lives to a new experience of freedom, of true happiness, of love.
teaser: Everything we do is based on the agreements that we have made — agreements often imposed on us by our parents, our schools, or our society, which turn us into people-pleasing machines. Don Miguel Ruiz wrote The Four Agreements as a challenge to society’s rules of domestication.

title: Qigong for Healing with Chunyi Lin
body: “A healer in every family and a world without pain.” This is the vision of Master Chunyi Lin, founder of Spring Forest Qigong. When teachings from a qigong master helped him recover completely from the physical pain and emotional trauma of his childhood in China’s Cultural Revolution, Master Lin traveled around China to study with every qigong master he could find. He brought this knowledge to America, where he has now led more than 300,000 people to find their own inner peace and healing. Qigong is so simple, anyone can do it. He demonstrates several techniques for waking up the chi — the life force — and for easing back pain, headache, improving eyesight, opening blockages, and more.
teaser: “A healer in every family and a world without pain.” This is the vision of Master Chunyi Lin. He demonstrates several techniques for waking up the chi, easing back pain, headache, improving eyesight, opening blockages, and more.

title: The Healthy Brain with Dr. Ilene Naomi Rusk
body:
Did you know Alzheimer’s can begin decades before symptoms appear? The good news is that you can preserve and improve your high-level thinking skills by taking charge of your brain health. But time is of the essence. Dr. Ilene Naomi Rusk, an internationally recognized neurobehavioral expert, outlines a variety of steps you can take to stave off cognitive decline. She stresses the need to identify root causes and risk factors, such as poor diet or even loneliness. Although treatments always need to be individualized, in all cases brain exercise is very important for a healthy brain.  

Dr. Ilene Naomi Rusk is Co-Director of the Healthy Brain Program and is coordinator of the Rehabilitation and trauma treatment programs.  She has a  Ph.D. from the University of Birmingham in England  and has authored numerous papers in the areas of psychology, neuropharmacology and neuroscience  in areas as diverse as cerebral palsy, Parkinson's disease, Alzheimer's disease, and the effects of neurotransmitters on behavior.
teaser: Did you know Alzheimer’s can begin decades before symptoms appear? You can preserve and improve your high-level thinking skills by taking charge of your brain health. Dr. Ilene Naomi Rusk outlines steps you can take to stave off cognitive decline.

title: The Awakened Woman with Tererai Trent
body:
How did Tererai Trent go from being an illiterate 14-year-old African bride to earning a doctorate and becoming one of the most recognizable voices for quality education and women’s empowerment? She dreamed an impossible dream — she dreamed she would go to America, be an undergraduate, earn a masters and PhD, and break the cycle of poverty in her family and in her village. She explains how she held to that dream; how she wouldn’t let it die; how she found strength in her mother and grandmother; and all the action she took to turn her dream into a reality. “It’s not your past that will define you; it is your dreams.”

Dr. Tererai Trent is one of today’s most internationally recognized voices for quality education and women’s empowerment. Distinguished as Oprah’s “All-Time Favorite Guest”, Dr. Trent is a scholar, humanitarian, motivational speaker, educator, mentor, and founder of Tererai Trent International.
teaser: How did Tererai Trent go from being an illiterate 14-year-old African bride to earning a doctorate and becoming one of the most recognizable voices for quality education and women’s empowerment?

title: The Akashic Records Made Easy with Sandra Anne Taylor
body: Wouldn’t you love to know your future? Even better: wouldn’t you love to write your future? According to NY Times best-selling author, psychic, and Akashic Record expert Sandra Anne Taylor, your future is not predestined, but exists as energetic potential and is actually being written by you every day. She explains how to access your spiritual patterns to unlock the infinite power, wisdom, and energy of the universe.  And she concludes with a guided meditation anyone can use to access their own Akashic Records.
teaser: Wouldn’t you love to know your future? Even better: wouldn’t you love to write your future? Akashic Records expert Sandra Anne Taylor shows you how.

title: Dying with No Regrets with Kitty Edwards
body:
Would you like to live a life with no regrets?  Shamanic practitioner Kitty Edwards, the executive director of the Living & Dying Consciously Project, shares the five life practices she follows to help her get to her death bed with no regrets. We often hear about the regrets of the dying, who say they regretted working too much and spending too little time with family. It’s an illusion to think that we will live forever in this body. If we really want to live a conscious life, we all need to be conscious about the dying process and transcend the “death phobia” in our culture.

Kitty Edwards is certified by the Institute of Energy Medicine to teach Dying Consciously: The Greatest Journey. She is the Executive Director of the Living & Dying Consciously Project and has a private practice in energy medicine.
teaser: Would you like to live a life with no regrets?  Shamanic practitioner Kitty Edwards, the executive director of the Living & Dying Consciously Project, shares the five life practices she follows to help her get to her death bed with no regrets.

title: The Art of Living Your Dreams with Mike Dooley
body:
Do you want to know how to be at the right place at the right time? We can actually control that with our thoughts. Most of us don’t get the degree to which this is true, according to best-selling author Mike Dooley. But we choose, in the moment, what to focus on, and it’s those thoughts alone that will become the things and events of our life. Now, it doesn’t happen overnight; you have to show up every day, you have to deliberately focus on your dreams, you have to turn your thoughts into things with your daily practice — and this is how you can fine tune the art of living your dreams.

Mike Dooley is a New York Times best-selling author and creator of the wildly popular Notes from the Universe, a philosophical adventurers’ club that is now home to more than 800,000 online members.
